name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Lab Corp blood results
text: Lab Corp had my weekly blood work results on the last app Up two months ago earlier in 2018, since they forced everyone to open up the HealthVault app to get results I have not been able to get one result and I just found out that they do not supply results to iPhones five, six and seven. After spending hours checking I found out that you need an iPhone 8 or 10 and that is ridiculous, it had been working for three years just fine and I can guarantee you that regular hard-working people cannot afford the latest phones. This is a terrible new system which excludes The majority of regular people with regular phones. I am a transplant patient and I need to keep up with my blood work results frequently since many levels such as my potassium could cause me heart problems from one week to another. I hope someone gets back in touch with me or I will be switching lab companies who can supply a simple task as supplying blood work results which I pay for.

Just wish you would go back to how well it worked in 2015.

I only with other companies would cooperated with them more, Fitbit use to work with it. 

I understand this is a highly regulated field (government can place hefty fines) so MS tries to reduce the risk. I fear MS will close this venture one day.

This is not user friendly and needs to be easy to use for all ages. Get with it! The biggest hassle was the part where you have to enter the letters/numbers to prove you're not a robot or whatever. name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Lab results from labcorp need serious revision
text: I only downloaded this for lab results, since labcorp is supposed to be completely loaded into this. No dates. None. So I open a diagnostic result thinking it's a follow up, get excited that the result looks awesome, then realize it was years old. Then I went looking for the updated result, which should be in here by now. I was no where. You guys have a professional liability to patients accessing their own medical records. This app could actually create problems for management of chronic conditions. You either need to remove the lab results function completely, or you need to fix it completely. I'm not saying that as a random complainer, indignant over a bad product. I'm saying that as a person who provides care in the medical field and I am horrified at the idea that patients (including me, briefly) might trust this app. If I were giving out medical information in this format, my malpractice company would be ripping their hair out.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Sync to HoMedics
text:
I have been using a Walgreens blood pressure meter, and I have come up with a method to sync using my iPhone 6s:

1 Log out of HealthVault and HoMedics.
2 Sign into HoMedics, sign into HealthVault using HoMedics, then skip healthvault and select your account,
3 Share.
4 Sign into vault and look to see if it worked.

This can be easily corrected by at least prompting the user to confirm the deletion. Really frustrating after spending ten minutes finger-typing a detailed description of a symptom or ailment. 
Bad UI overall as well, but the cancel is by far the worst.

name: Microsoft HealthVault

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Has crashed every time I've used it
text:
Frequent, inexplicable crashes
UI is clearly not optimized for Plus phones 
Support link takes me to a web browser which gives me a certificate warning before presenting me with a popup for a username and password. Unacceptable. 
No summary view of health stats

In the end, I'm not sure what this is supposed to be. It's far too buggy and the certificate warning doesn't feel at all "vault"-like and the UI doesn't remotely compete with Fitbit's or Apple's health apps. 

I'm still unclear how I'm supposed to use this. Is this for fitness tracking, as hinted by the list of apps it ties into? If so, why can't I track explicitly within the app? 

Is it for sharing medical information with my doctor? It seems to have the relevant data, but no clear way to do it. 

This seems like a solution looking for a problem, but the solution itself is problematic. 

Microsoft, you can do better, especially if you want me to trust you with my medical information. I look forward to you incorporating my feedback in future iterations, but this product is not up to par with your recent Surface Book and Windows 10 wins.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Good Concept - Fails on all advertised features

Would rate a "0" if it were an option.  Setup is convoluted and instructions are unclear.  Links to supposedly compatible Apps and other resources simply do not work.  Links drop you at the opening page to Apps, then fail to link after signing in with no clear reason. 
Updates once or twice in the beginning, but then stops without an explanation in logs, so troubleshooting is impossible.
Currently receiving "Frame Load" error on start and cannot log in. 
App is completely useless!!

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Start of something great...left unfinished!
text:
I've been using HealthVault (HV) on the Web (desktop and iPad), and iPhone for 2-3 years. I love what has been started... really! I have ongoing health issues, that keep me in the medical system frequently. 

Currently, where it help most is keeping a current medication list. Then, I can easily print a copy for my wife, in case of emergency. And run off copies when I'm going to the doctor, so I don't have to write it all down, or verbally go over it. They love it! 

Medication History, being one of the most frequently used features, is also the weakest feature, at least that I'm aware of, in the iOS version. It shows you EVERYTHING YOU'VE EVER ENTERED, with no way to filter it to the current melds. If they aren't going to allow filtering at this time, they should at least make the only available display be CURRENT mess only. Then it would be helpful.

The whole mobile app needs to be tossed, and a team that knows how to design data-driven mobile sites, should help a great UI designer start with a blank sheet. There is nothing in the old one id want to salvage, nor would I want to tether them with the old code. 

The HV website has gotten enough traction that several of the health / exercise-related IoT devices, will automatically update HV from their own update site. THAT'S how things should work! And it was super easy to set-up. I had my FitBit, and Withings device talking together with MyFitnessPal in no time. So, let's build on the good...

HV needs to be proactive in writing connections to the major EMR systems (both clinical, and hospital), lab systems, radiology systems, and pharmacy management systems. If the took the top three players in each category, and wrote import connections from the healthcare provider-side into HV, probably 80% of all our medical records could be imported directly from the provider's system. This would be incredible, compared to hand-input, or scanning in information.

I could go on and on with ideas on where to go with HealthVault...but they haven't asked me. ğŸ˜�

I'm not to the point of throwing it out yet, but I so wish this didn't seem like an orphan in Redmond.

text: Works great on iPhone 5 AND with OpenID - I just created my Account with no issues! Sweet app - lets me carry all my Health Information with me offline. And this is a full featured NATIVE iOS app, fast and responsive -- not a web app. Also - your phone already has a pin code, so use it. Some reviewers here appear biased...

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: No pin password lock?
text: Come on Microsoft! Even the most basic apps have the ability to use a four-digit pin password to open the app. Fail.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Needs improvement
text: It only allows you to edit certain information, others you have to go to the website. The app could have a nicer GUI - I like eye candy. There also should be an iPad version.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Easy mobile access to healthvault
text: Just doing an updated review. Facebook login is broken, but I was able to create an OpenID and login through that on the app. Anyway, once logged in the app seems to work well. I'll probably use it more than the actual website.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Finally!!
text: Perfect app, let's me do everything I need right from my phone. Good stuff MS.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: I love the app but something is missing
text: I think this is a great app, I use it to track my glucose levels and other numbers, but I think it should e password protected so that when someone borrows my phone or I misplace it they cannot see my information.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Long time waiting!
text: I've been waiting for a long time for this app! I use Health Vault on my computer, but have had to use other apps on my iPhone. Had trouble getting started, but now everything is working great. Wish I could edit stuff that I entered in the computer.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Finally, I can enter my daily weight!
text: I almost wrote my own iphone app to perform these features, but much happer with MS version. They must have been holding out until the Samsung v. iPhone verdict. Since Samsung lost I suspect MS had no choice but to release this app. In either case it is welcome. Better late than never...

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Good
text: Was glad to see this show up in the app store. It seemed to have some difficulty signing in to my established account for the first time but the third try worked. After that...golden.

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Usually use my iPad!
text:
While I ALWAYS have my iPhone with me, I would be using my iPad with this app. Do you hear? We NEED an iPad app for this to be useful. 
Here is why: 
 Easier to enter info
 Easier to view for both patient AND doctor
 
Thank you for having this app for our doctors and patient to use. Now we need a great update for iPad and I'll be able to give the app 5 stars!

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Weak IPAD app
text:
Taking an IPhone app and enlarging it with 2X does not make a iPad app. Very weak for such a powerful company.

Hope the SURFACE app is better :)

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Wow - all my Health Vault info has come alive!
text: The website is good, but this is great!

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: Direct Project secure messages?

name: Microsoft HealthVault
title: What a great app
text: My whole family's history is here even the pets. I will never have to ask the doctors for my family's shot records again!!!

name: FitnessSyncer

Upon initial install under previous version of iOS, this app seemed just thing needed to sync my Apple Health information to Fitbit, so I purchased the Pro plan and away it synced.

Upon updating both my iPhone, and reinstalling the app for good measure, the app presents me with a blank, black screen before dying after about 30s. Background syncing wasn't happening, instead I was being prompted via notification to launch and manually sync.

The UI isn't that great but is functional. 

CONCLUSION: fix the app.

text: Having recently relocated from another country and trying to navigate USA healthcare - these guys have made it painless and really went the extra mile to help and support my family and I.....fantastic service ğŸ‘�

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Lifesaver
text:
Last year I was diagnosed with Breast Cancer. I am happy to say I am for the most part on the other side of my illness and on the road to recovery. The services Accolade provide were in my opinion Lifesaving!!! As you could imagine, getting my diagnosis was scary and shocking. I had no idea where to start. I did not want to just start researching on the internet and risk getting bad information or how to process all the obstacles around my illness and treatment. Accolade provided me with a team of support. I spoke with nurses and medical billing experts that guided me through every question and really provided great emotional support. They really gave me the support and attention that I needed and felt like an extension of
of my closest family and friends. I felt safe and reassured ina regular basis. Even now, as I continue to deal with overwhelming insurance claims, my Accolade rep Allison has been so thoughtful, caring and attentive. This service is a major benefit and I am so grateful I had the people and the service in my corner during this time!

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Great benefits and great caring team. Ie; Heather and Caryn.
text: Great benefits and great caring team. Ie; Heather and Caryn.

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: AccoladeSğŸ˜Š for Accolade
text: The nurses at Accolade are so helpful, friendly, professional, genuinely caring, and knowledgeable!!! April, Cali, and Katlyn are the sweetest nurses. They call to see how youâ€™re doing, see if you have questions, give great advice by phone and through the app. They even advocate for you!!! The App is easy to use, and itâ€™s easy for them to send lists of doctors you may be looking for. Itâ€™s a convenient way to communicate if your too busy to talk on the phone bc of work, etc, and itâ€™s an easy app! Thanks! KG

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Accolade saved me from huge bills
text: I once had an emergency bill from hospital that is more than $7000. My colleague suggested me to use Accolade and I did. With the help of my assistant Alexa, who was very kind and helpful, my insurance company re-evaluate the claim and eventually paid off for the whole bill since I had already met the personal integrated deductible. I cannot say thank you more to Accolade and Alexa. Indeed a must have service.

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Awesome
text: Very helpful, will go beyond to get an answer for you!

name: Accolade, Inc.

I love Accolade and the app is undeniably convenient... however, the lack of human to human conversation is frustrating. I am able to text with an employee and slowly but surely get what I need, but I prefer immediate gratification found in actual conversation.
I love that the app can store all my insurance cards as well.

This system has been a long time coming to patients and definitely needed.  First impression: Amazing and efficient. Will review again when time tested!  Thank you to health representative Lisa!

Also I'm not getting notifications other than he badge icon. I have all notifications turned on. Can you please fix this?

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Message alerts?
text:
This is a suggestion for the app only (not the medical services available)... 

It would be super helpful for me to see some kind of 'flag' notification on the 'face' of the app so I know I have a message / response and to open the app... I'm not always thinking about checking messages there... an indication that I SHOULD check would be awesome!

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Great way to save time and stay on top of your benefits!
text: I think this app is useful in that you don't have to spend time looking for numbers and info to contact your accolade assistant . I can chat on the app and ask my questions and my assistant gets back to me when she is in the office. My assistant is on the west coast so calling her over and over doesn't work. I can leave a chat message and she responds in her office hours. The one star I took away for is that this app should be expanded to let you see your benefits info and claims that you have out instead of going to other websites. One stop shop would make this a 5 star app!

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: So bless
text: Love the staff at Accolade

text: It calls my nurse or Heath agent for me, and let's me IM them directly. Had my biometric readings everything accolade has in pretty much here too.

name: Accolade, Inc.
title: Need Messages
text:
This app is great I you want to chat with a specialist, however when I get a notice of a new message in my email, I can't go to the app and read it. It would be great if I could see all of that info without having to select the link and go into the actual website, I thought that was what an app was supposed to be for.  

If they added that feature it would be 5 stars.

name: Capzule
title: App is dead?
text:
App crashes within seconds of launch. Hard reset, uninstall and reinstall doesn’t help. Support website is down. 
Original app was great. New app, non functional.

name: Capzule
title: Best app ever
text: Perfect app

name: Capzule
title: Get rid of mandatory ads
text: Get rid of mandatory ads

name: Capzule
title: Baski Phamacist!
text: This is an awesome app. I recommend this app to my Patients, family and friends. You can keep all your appointments, allergies, health conditions in one place. Easier to email the information to healthcare professionals from app. You can manage your family’s healthcare at one place. User friendly!

name: Capzule
title: Lost data
text: Initially, I bought this at version 1.  I liked it but only needed to access it once or twice a year. So, when the iOS 11 update came out I was unaware that the app would not work. Fast forward to post iOS 11 update and version 1 no longer works. No backup of my data and can’t find a way to access or import the data to version 2. Poor planning on my part and the developers. They should have made it so we wouldn’t lose the data.  Also, I paid for the first version. Since iOS 11 and up do not support that version, it irritates me that I now must pay again (if I want to lose the adds) for a subscription. Wrong, just wrong.

name: Capzule
title: Best Medical app ever!
text: I have used Capzule for several years to keep track of medical information for family and friends. I tried several apps before settling on this one. I like how all the information is gathered in one place and it is easy to access. I use it all the time for every appointment, Information on meds and contact information. I love how you can attach pictures and documents. As said, everything is all in one place and that makes it super easy. I have been at Stanford and UCSF using this app and medical staff were very impressed!

name: Capzule
title: Super App
text: I have used this app for a few years now and I have all of our family’s medical history in one spot. Doctors are amazed how much information I readily have on hand. This is the best personal health record I found to date. Not thrilled with the ads popping up now and don’t plan on paying a recurring fee to get rid of them. I guess it is just business. I can live with them. Again, best app to record and track your family’s medical history. Would highly recommend it.

name: Capzule
title: CAUTION you will Lose your medical records!!!
text: The idea behind this app is great and there is certainly a need given modern medicine BUT their execution is HORRIBLE. After using the app for a year or so there was an update and “Poof” all our records were gone and could no longer be recovered.  What happens next?? Nothing. You start over. There is no customer service, there is no phone number. Your records are simply gone. Think about it. You spend the time and energy to consolidate all your records in one place and then one day after an iOS update or app update they’re gone!

name: Capzule
title: No paid version with no adds
text:
Based on other reviews and some testing it is not worth the time to put all your data into an app only to be consumed by adds. 

Please give us an option for a paid version.

name: Capzule
title: Stunningly Awful!!!!  It was such a great App.
text: Hard to believe, but this app’s performance just goes from poor to very, very, bad.  And it was such a wonderful piece of software back in the day.  So sad.  I can no longer backup data - not in Google Drive or Dropbox, Clicking on Airdrop just causes the app to crash, and now not even emailing works!  The email is never sent.  So no more sharing between devices.  It has to be manually entered on each one!  Either fix the app so it works properly or just put it out of our misery!!!!

name: Capzule
title: Former favorite
text: Capzule was my former favorite, even with the ads. However it now stays open only for a couple of seconds after tapping icon, both on IPhone 6 and 8Plus. Would have been 5 stars except for this unfortunate glitch.

name: Capzule
title: Great Program
text: This is the best medical record I have found on IOS. The only draw back is that sometimes there is an issue with merging data between two devices in fact the other day I did that and it crashed the program on both devices and to reinstall then restore from back. So make sure you back up anytime there are changes.

name: Capzule
title: Must have App
text: I have been using this app for years and love it. I have two autoimmune disorders which require me to go to numerous doctors during the year. I totally depend on Capzule to keep me organized. When I’m referred to a new doctor, I have all my medications listed and history of my past medical procedures etc to review with doctor. I recently had problems with my iPhone 6 which made me get a new phone an iPhone 8. I had not been able to update my old phone for some time so I had not had any problems with Capzule. However with the iPhone 8 my Capzule would not work and I was lost!!  After much searching I found an updated app in the App Store and luckily I had backup in my cloud so I was able to restore everything to my new phone Praise the Lord! This app is awesome. Everyone needs it.

name: Capzule
title: Horrible
text: Had no chance to back up data before the app stopped working with last iOS update. Have my medical history but my other family’s was lost. Stupidly enough I bought the updated app (would’ve been nice if the developer let us download the new app for free as we’d already paid for it but NO). Paid for and downloaded the new app and now IT doesn’t work and is out if date. Complete waste of money, do not buy!

name: Capzule
title: Annoying ads
text: Went from useful to terrible. Ads pop up constantly. Very heavy handed. App will load full page ads before even using. Agree with other reviewers. There’s no option to buy out. Been using this app for years. Develop switch app and old app no longer works with new iOS

name: Capzule
title: Can’t get help
text: I used the previous version for years.  That version is not supported by current iOS.   I can’t import data from old to new version.  There is no way to contact capzule for help.  I’ve essentially lost over 5 years of data for my chronically ill child.

name: Capzule
title: Best in class though still a few hiccups
text:
No other medical record application comes even close to the capabilities in Capzule. I use it for all medical consultations and demonstrate it for interested health provider personnel. Most of them are amazed and some express interest in possibly getting it. We are all appreciative of the local only data storage and no Internet connection required.

Two gotchas at this point (01/08/2018) with version 2.0.1 (iPad): a) no direct contact with any application support personnel, b) Dropbox and local network HTTP functionality doesn’t appear to work. Use of Dropbox pops up authorization window but no backup is ever performed (screen blinks after allowing access and then drops back to Capzule). Initiating local network transfer fails as Capzule never opens up the designated port.

b) HTTP connectivity: issue resolved - desktop multi-network control sequence
Dropbox connectivity: issue not resolved; even after rebooting Capzule client devices the Dropbox Authorization process appears to work but no backup file is uploaded; screen immediately returns to Capzule

name: Capzule
title: Is app continuing?
text:
This has got to be THE best app for health issues. I actually recorded each of my kids’  health records from their newborn records and their records for school. I wrote in a family history as well so that the kids can print it out and rake it to their own doctor appointments. I was able to upload medical reports and photos (ugh!) of my EGD scope! Incredible. Since my phone calendar doesn’t go back a whole year, I can look at the app to see whenI should get in for my annual exam.

Seriously, this app is all you need to carry around all your medical data for any appointments.

Start keeping your kids’ records with you for all pediatrician visits and jot down when they have all those childhood illnessss.

name: Capzule
title: Get a paid version
text: I’ve been using this app for awhile and loved it till the latest release with adds.

name: Capzule
title: Used to love this app until upgrade
text: I used the old version of Capzule for several years and backed it up frequently. I loved the old version! However, ever since the upgrade to the new version, I can’t access my old back-up to transfer to the new version. So I guess I have to re-enter everything from memory which defeats the  purpose of having the old app that I can’t access!! If there is an IT person that can help resolve this issue then I’ll be happy to give this app 5 stars with raving reviews.

name: Capzule
title: Great health record
text: I am so glad the Capzule app is updated. It allows for mobile health records which can be easily kept up to date.

name: Capzule
title: Very good app. Zero support
text: Very useful app. Rather than update app. A new app was created. Information from old app will not transfer and you obviously can’t open old app on new iOS to manually copy data. No way of contacting Capzule either.

name: Capzule
title: Love this app, but some issues and enhancements
text:
Love the app, glad to see it back. I can deal with the ads, but would like to see a new pay version.

DropBox isn’t working for me. When I go into the tools or the backup, it asks me to allow the program to access Dropbox but it never lets me do a backup. I can backup to Google Drive with no problem. 

I would like to see a way to remove data. I track my blood sugar and insulin usage daily. That’s 365 entries in a year and all I really need access to is the most recent 90-120 entries. Maybe a way to delete by date range? Or even a way to quickly mark a screen full of entries to delete. 

Finally, I would like to store templates separately from my data. Lacking a way to mass delete data, I was thinking I could copy a template into self monitoring and call it Diabetes 2017, then copy it in as Diabetes 2018 and simply delete 2017 at some point. Thanks!

name: Capzule
title: Unable to move backup from Capzule  1.0 to 2.0
text:
My backups are in iCloud. There a way to restore the 1.0 backup  from iCloud to Capzule 2.0. After upgrading to iOS 11 I can’t even start Capzule 1.0. 
Please advise.... thanks

name: Capzule
title: Still no Dropbox Backup
text:
I’ve had this program for a long time and it’s great. Very useful & largely functional. But one concern is always, how to make sure your info is secure beyond just living on your phone? 

I like to backup to a separate iPad when possible using Dropbox. That quit working a few weeks ago. The developer released an upgrade that was supposed to fix that. But now when I try the backup, I get sent to my Dropbox app to approve Capzule’s access. When I click to Allow, I get sent right back to the Capzule app with no backup happening. Try the backup again, get sent back to Dropbox again to allow access. OVER AND OVER. Something is not communicating right between those two. Please help!

Edit to add: developer contacted me, I can’t respond by e-mail or on their website though - only though the App Store on my phone, which I hate. Anyway: tried closing and launching both apps in various orders, same result. Deleted Dropbox & re-installed it, same result. Tap settings -> cloud symbol under Backup -> Dropbox; Dropbox launches and says “Capzule PHR Free would like access to files & folders in your Dropbox” -> tapping Allow causes the “Authorizing” box to momentarily appear, then Capzule reopens to the account page and the News folder flashes blue two times... but the only message in the folder is the Version 2.0.1 announcement. If I try to backup again the whole process repeats again. This is on an iPhone SE running 11.1.1 although I believe I was having difficulty backing up back on iOS 10. The newer version of Capzule seems to have introduced this endless loop though.

name: Capzule
title: Conversion from old app
text: The app is great, but no notice was given that it was being updated and that the old data doesn’t transfer over in order to view as before- very disappointing!

name: Capzule
title: Thought this was a great app until
text:
I open the app and I now get a pop up message that says “a new version is released with fix for iCloud and dropbox connectivity problem. Thank you” at the bottom of the box it says OK and takes you to the App Store which does not give you the option to update just to open the app and when you open the app the same message appears therefore I cannot access any of the information in the app.
UPDATE: The next day there was an update option in the App Store which I did and now the app is running perfectly.

name: Capzule
title: Used to be 5 stars
text: My biggest complaint is the irritating ads which now randomly pop up while I'm trying to take notes in the doctors office. They are full page and require you to click them off before you continue. I'm irritated by this, But it's still a really great app. Please bring back the paid app without ads, and I will pay more for it and give you 5 stars again!

name: Capzule
title: Lost all data with iOS 11
text: I found this app very useful. But after my iPhone update to iOS11 I’m unable to access the app or transfer the data to the new version. Very inconvenient. I will look for a new app.

name: Capzule
title: Ok for a free app
text: Been using it since 2014.  New upgrade is VERY similar to old v1.0 with 2 big FLAWS!  Unable to import data from old app unless you had them backed up separately!  Now there are pop-up ads (annoying). So instead of re-entering data all over again, purchase an ad free app and start from scratch!

name: Capzule
title: Give us a paid option pronto!
text: I’ve been using the app for a few years, it really keeps me organized, love the calendar integration and prescriptions list. I refer to it every doctor’s visit. I’m older now and not having to memorize my meds and dosages is very handy. I’m also very happy the app is now iOS 11 compatible but now its ad sponsored and I really don’t like that at all. Today I was prompted to watch a video and the sound was on. Having this go off while I was in a meeting was aggravating. I’d gladly pay for the app to get rid of this. Without it I may have to look elsewhere to record my medical data.

name: Capzule
title: I Agree with KB0804!!
text: I agree with everything in that review! I love this app! Please, please keep it going!

name: Capzule
title: Upset customer
text: I had the old paid version of capzule. I updated my phone to the new iOS 11 software for my phone and went to open the app and it states that it isn’t supported by the new software update. I try to update & can’t. I downloaded the newest version to see if I can have the information migrated over and I can’t. 7+ years of medical records of me and my family- GONE!! There is no way to contact the developer to get an answer. I tried following the steps on the page with no success. I can’t find an email- nothing. I’m so upset, frustrated and disappointed that they would do this.

name: Capzule
title: Bring Back Paid Version!
text: This is a fantastic app. My wife uses it religiously, and nothing out there compares. We were very disappointed when there was no iOS 11 support, but thrilled beyond belief when you released the tweaked ad-supported version here. But please, give us the option to pay for ad removal. There are those like us who are so appreciative of your software, we’d be willing to pay (again) for this “new” version!

name: Capzule
title: Thank you, thank you, thank you
text: I had all but given up my precious app when 2.0 appeared. I’ve been using this app since 2012 and depended heavily on it especially as I age and have more doctors appointments. I almost missed out transferring my info as IOS 11 overran my iPad but you saved the day. A bit tricky at first to figure out transferring old info. It would be helpful to give a way to restore from an old backup if Capzule 1 was rendered non functional. Syncing (or fixing sync) with Dropbox would give it 5 stars for me. Don’t leave again please.

name: Capzule
title: Updated....where’s all my data?
text: Thanks for updating the app for iOS 11, however, years of data is gone.

name: Capzule
title: I LOOOVVVEEE this App!!
text:
I guarantee you that I am beyond abnormal when it comes to keeping detailed PHR (personal health records), and I take much pride in staying organized and on top of my medical history. Having many medical issues and having to see many different doctors, it’s so nice to have everything in one place that is very clean, visually appealing, and user friendly. I was freaking out when I thought they did away with the app, but now it contains ads (I originally paid the $20, but I’m just glad I still have my Capzule HR!) TRUST ME...I have tried them all and nothing comes close to this app. 
Please continue to remain in the App Store forever!

name: Capzule
title: Can old data from the original be moved to 2.0
text:
I love this app. Used the old version for years. I didn’t know where else to ask this question. 

If I have already updated to iOS 11, Is it possible to transfer information from the previous app to the new 2.0 version? I am worried it will not be able to access my original data. 

Thank you for your help!!

UPDATE: Thank you for the quick response. I did back it up, but to iCloud. Will I be able to access it from iCloud?

name: Capzule
title: Update removed my paid features
text: I paid for Capzule 1.0. I was overjoyed to see that they put out 2.0 so I would not lose it during the 11.0 upgrade. But they put out a add supported only version, ignoring those of us who paid $4.99 for the previous add free app. And when you go to app support, you are directed to their website with *no* way to contact them via email or form. So the took our money and then put out a mandatory upgrade that removed the paid features, and I am left with no choice but to leave a 1 star review.

name: Capzule
title: Can't transfer Capsule 1 data to Capsule 2
text:
My husband and I have used and relied on Capsule to maintain our medical records for over 5 years. To use this new version we must re-enter our profiles and all our medical data. That's not acceptable. Please provide a link to resolve this issue.

Thank you for your response. I was able to transfer our data and all is well. Like some of the changes such as being able to add physician from appt screen.

name: Capzule
title: Love this app!
text: I've used this app for quite awhile and it has become indispensable for me. I am able to schedule my appointments in the app and they automatically show up in my calendars. I take a photo of my lab results to put in Capzule's files. I can put lab results like blood pressure and cholesterol into Capzule and see at a glance results on a chart. Backup has been smooth and sharing within my devices works fine. At the doctor's office I am able to access any medical info in seconds. I know Capzule needs to place ads to keep developing it so that doesn't bother me. It would be nice to have the option to pay to eliminate the ads like so many other apps do. Thanks for a wonderful app!

name: Capzule
title: Use to love it
text: I always loved this app until the new updated version.  I hate the pop up adds.  Isn't there a way to get rid of them. If so I would give it 5 stars

name: Capzule

Since there is no other way to restore data from the previous version, I'm stuck.  Time to migrate to something else I guess.  UPDATE: I was able to restore from backup using dropbox.  The airdrop issue was limited to the iPad, but I could not get an iPhone and iPad to recognize capzule on each device.  The instructions and capabilities provided are in some cases incomplete and in others wrong, as they refer to capabilities that do not function.

name: Capzule
title: Absolutely rely on this app
text: I love this app, really rely on it to keep track of my medical history, including prescribed medications. It's comprehensive and easy to use, and has proven its worth many times over, including during medical appointments.  The ads aren't greatly intrusive, but I would gladly pay for an ad-free version.

name: Capzule
title: Love it! But...
text: I had the last version and I loved it too.  The only thing I've noticed is that there's advertising on the new one and no way so far to remove.  I also haven't found a way to contact them to ask questions like how to remove the advertising.

name: Capzule
title: Please don't ever stop making this app!
text: I have literally never written an app review before. However, I felt compelled to do so because I can't imagine keeping track of my families medical records without this app. When I learned that it would not be supported in iOS11, I downloaded over 10 other PHR apps but none even came close to what this one can accomplish.  Andaman7 was the best alternative I found , but the lab tracking leaves much to be desired.  Capzule is by far the easiest to use, most comprehensive in terms of what info you can store, and has the best UI of any PHR app out there. My only wish is that I could pay them a lump sum to remove the adds. But the company has to be able make money to keep developing the app.  Thank you soooooo much for keeping this app going.

name: Capzule
title: Wondering
text: This app is "one of a kind."  It allows you to accurately record records.  I used it much with my wife's cancer up to the point of her death...it provided continuity of care instructions and documented well test results.  It is disappointing to find this version full if adds...I use it because it is good for my own medical challenges but the adds are a nuisance.  Don't know why developers can not create purchase option...

What is a BIG negative is that there appears to be no way to backup this precious data. (1 star)  You can't do it in iCloud.  Somewhere, a brief note popped up that said it could be done in Dropbox. However, when I tried that, another note popped up from the app that said it could not backup to an old Dropbox platform.  I don't know what that means.  Within the last two months, I upgraded my Dropbox to 1TB. 

I'm hesitant to enter anymore data in this app when I have no way at all to back it up. The User Guide in the app isn't of any help.

name: My Medical

name: My Medical

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful App!!!
text:
As of July 2017, I am into my sixth year with this app. It is still in essential in my opinion and does exactly what they say it will do. I am confused by those Who have given the app low ratings. My only experience with support has been outstanding. This app is all I need now when I go into a doctors office for the first time. Doctors love the thoroughness and emergency medical personnel or even more impressed.  I have had to use the app in emergency and regular doctor visit situations so I know where of I speak.  And no I am not related to the developer!

[Original review]

Has a wonderful variety of options to input everything you need to remember.  I have been carryinging a medical history for a year now on paper.  This has me ready to give up the paper and just carry my phone with a medical symbol sticker on the case.  I especially like the web site this app allows you to use to enable easier loading of data.  My only suggestion would be to add an ability to mark certain pills and doctors to appear in groupings for specific chronic treatment issues rather than to have to check all areas for what might otherwise be referenced through a special sub folder on diabetes for example.  I have already shared this app with one of my doctors and he loved it. 

Been using for over a year now and still love it!!  I have used it when visiting new doctors and checking into the hospital.  They have all been most impressed with how organized I am.  I tell everyone I meet who has a complex medical history or parents they assist or children whose immunizations they need to track about this app.  Best money I ever spent in the app store!

I've now been using this app for three years and still consider it the best money I ever spent on an app. There have been some issues along the way. So before turning on or off synching or such, be sure to back up data. The one time I needed to use it, it worked like a charm. Still highly recommended.

name: My Medical
title: Mad

I've had this app for years and loved it, but now I'm screwed, I'm going to have to contact all my doctors and hospitals to try a retrieve my info, and try to fine a new app that will work properly.

name: My Medical
title: One of A Kind
text: Hands down the best PHR on the app market for a complicated medical history!

name: My Medical
title: Doesn't work anymore
text: Doesn't work anymore. Freezes up and the records not synced across iOS devices.

name: My Medical
title: Good app, better with additions
text: This is a good app, although tedious to input info. It really needs capability to back up info- I didn't notice this and its mandatory in my view. Would be great if could upload info.

name: My Medical
title: Is the developer still out there?
text: I've owned this program for Mac and iOS for several years, and it's great at keeping track and syncing across platforms. I've encountered a few bugs recently, and have tried to correspond with developer, but with no reply. Consistent with the silence, the last upgrade was Oct 2015, and the web page dates are 2011, so caveat emptor....

name: My Medical
title: Crying tears at lost data
text: I've used this app for several years and it has been invaluable through all of my family's medical issues. It was working fine up until the last upgrade on my phone. Now all of our medical files including notes from doctor visits are gone. Since the iCloud back up option was removed, I had not established an alternate way to back up my files so all of the info is lost--if it was still on my phone it would have loaded right? I am so incredibly mad at the creative tech genius who caused this failure. Yes, I should have taken more time to figure out a good way to back up the info (it used to update my Mac version but stopped when the iCloud connection ended), but given that I'm not the only one experiencing this lost, I am blaming the tech people. So this app gets one star for losing all my valuable and irreplaceable family medical files. Oh, yes, and I too have not heard word one from the app maker regarding my recent complaint. I'm starting my hunt for a replacement today.

name: My Medical
title: Life saver!!!!
text: I, unfortunately, have many medical issues and too many surgeries to remember. This app has been a life saver!  Every doctor and ER that I have shown this to thinks it's the easiest medical app that they have seen! I love that I can attach my surgical reports and photos in here and if somebody needs them, I can easily email it to them. No more, "I'm sorry, doc, but I'll send them later." Later does no good when you need them now while you're still there. Thank you for this app!!!

name: My Medical
title: App that's actually useful
text:
Over the past few days I was looking for a Medical app that would include medications, prescriptions, doctors, health information and be able to sync from iPad to iPhone and vice verses. Not to mention that I did not want my information "stored" on someone else's server. Tired of hearing about yackey yay being broken in and personal information stolen.
I wanted an app that was less than a year old. Well this one was made in Dec 2015, but the things this app can do. 
It's a journal and it's a pain to enter all the information required. But once everything is updated you only have to sit back and have your Medical history at your finger tips.
Just think if you get a new doctor or want a second opinion all you have to do is pull your phone out....
Warning: IF YOU entered it wrong you only have yourself to blame.

name: My Medical
title: Please revive or sell to another developer
text: This app, by far, is the best personal health record I have found. None have the detailed test results record, charting, and incorporation of PDF files.  (E.g. Complete blood count). Having just been admitted to the hospital, having the records going back 25 years was invaluable.  At one point, I said this app could be my sole justification for buying an iPad.  I still believe that.  That said, I'm profoundly disappointed with the apparent abandonment of this app.  I fear the day when an iOS upgrade will render this app and all the data entry useless.

name: My Medical
title: Tedious & Confusing
text: Have spent the best part of a week trying to use this app, but very confusing esp the when entering lab results. Should be an easier way to find names and ranges. Also poor customer service. Asked them a question and have not heard back. Save yourself some money!

name: My Medical
title: DO NOT BUY - NO support
text:
I used to love this app, and put 3 years of medical data in it. With the lastest system update, it won't open and I've LOST ALL MY DATA (despite regular backups to the cloud)... NO SUPPORT from the company, despite repeated attempts to contact them. 

Don't take the risk... look elsewhere.

name: My Medical
title: I can fix this beloved app and use it again.
text: I love this app and it is very comprehensive. Better than the others. Also easy to use. When I upgraded my OS it stopped woking. It is now syncing through drop box. Woo Hoo. It is working again. Yay for me to figure it out. Best app.

name: My Medical
title: BUYER BEWARE....
text:
Had this app since 2013 added all my medical records......APP will no longer open....just blank white screen.  Couldn't leave a review as in itunes it said I didn't own the app....which I DID.  NOW they want to CHARGE ME AGAIN..... and ALL MY MEDICAL RECORDS ARE GONE!  

Multiple attempts to contact develper with no response at all.  Finally, Itunes store came to the rescue.  Had to 
1- repurchase app (get refund) 
2- then open app.... now works.  
3-  Had to re-log into drop box and saved medical records somewhere else.

name: My Medical
title: Great PHR (Personal Health Record) App
text: No update since 2015. App locks up.  Backups are unreliable, I've lost last 2yrs of data even with Dropbox backup.

name: My Medical
title: Cannot import from contacts
text: First thing I tried to do was import my doctors names from my contact list. When I try that, the app crashes. There is no way to contact the developer on problems. I want my money back!

name: My Medical
title: Good product -Please update
text: Good product, just needs an update for compatibility with iOS 10.

name: My Medical
title: iPad Version Stopped Working No Response From Developer
text: I have used the My Medical app on my iPhone, iPad and Mac for several years and I WAS pleased with it.  After the iOS v10 upgrade it still works on my iPhone 7 and my Mac but all I get on my iPad Air 2 is a blank white screen. I have reported the bug to the developer and I have also sent an email request for help. No response, nothing from them for two plus weeks. Very disappointed. Developers should be willing and able to support their customers. Think carefully before you buy this app.

name: My Medical
title: Crashes
text: Crashes every time I try to import a contact

name: My Medical
title: App is great; CUSTOMER SERVICE AWFUL!!
text: I've purchased & have successfully used this app since 2012 on all my iPads.  Just purchased a new iPad and after backing up old device and restoring info to new one, this app was frozen with NO info in it on the new device.  Going back to the App Store to redownload the app - appeared as if I'd have to repurchase the app.  Frantic about losing 5 years of medical history for several family members, I contacted the app developer...several times over several weeks with NO response whatsoever.  I was finally able to contact Apple, with my previous purchase date and order number in tow from my App Store account, who was able to resolve my problem.  Thank goodness for Apple Support because this app developer has HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!!  Had it not been for that I'd likely have given a higher rating because the app is great for keeping up with family medical records.

name: My Medical
title: No Support
text:
I lost two years of data and I got no replies to my two request for help.
My advice is DO NOT BUY THIS APP or anything else that Hyrax sells.

name: My Medical
title: So Disappointed
text:
I have used this app for many years and I loved it.  I had all my medical records going back to 2005 entered in to it.  Then when the last IOS update came out it completely stopped working and all my records disappeared.  I have emailed their customer service many times since then and have gotten no response.
The records were still on an old Ipad I had that did not get the IOS update.  
Out of desperation I purchased this app again today.  I followed the instructions to transfer my records from my old Ipad to my new Ipad with the newly purchased app.  Not only did the records not transfer to the new app but it also wiped out the records and froze the program on the the old Ipad.
Two weeks ago I would have given this app 5 stars.  Now I have to re imput hundreds of lab tests, office visits, and medicatins.

name: My Medical
title: Frozen App, Zero Support
text: Please pay attention to this review. Medical records are too important to trust to irresponsible companies. The app, which worked for months, now freezes every time I try to open it. I have emailed support - nothing. Not even one of those sad emails acknowledging they will get back to me.

name: My Medical
title: 3 Years A User (priceless)
text: This is the app I use every time I visit the doctor.  I record test, meds, procedures, images of pill bottles, images of EKG print outs, and my complete history as far back as I can remember.  This is even more complete the forms the doctors provide.

name: My Medical
title: Best Medical App I have tried!
text: Have been using this app for about one year and love it. I have tried 3 other apps including the native Apple app and all were either to complicated and/or configured to rigidly to an idea like food, exercise, or medicines.  It did take me a bit to key in 5 years worth of blood pressure, weight, glucose, A1C and LDL, etc but it was worth it as I now just enter my latest numbers and can instantly see a trend. Entering all my prescriptions make it a breeze to show each time a different doctor asks. The fact that I am actively using it 12 months later is a big endorsement. Thanks for making a simple yet flexible app!

name: My Medical
title: Very Useful Tool
text:
I'm a Medical Technologist, and I support this app simply because it's easy to follow your progress based on the way you can put in your lab results as they come. We don't always go to the same laboratory all the time, and although there are other platforms to keep track of your records, this app allows you to DIY without the need to be attached to a specific provider. Yes in the begging and as you add more tests might be a little time consuming, it's totally worth it!
I recommend this app to anyone who wants to really take care of their health and be in control of the information.

name: My Medical
title: Mac App great, iOS app tells me pwd wrong
text:
I had no issues with either the Mac App or iOS app until early this year when i was no longer able to log in.

I've contacted the developer via email and today via Twitter and have had no response. 

I think apple needs to look at removing this app from the library. There have not been any updates to the app since 2014.

name: My Medical
title: Great App and Great Support.  Update: BEEN ABANDONED!
text:
This is a Great app. I have contacted Steve, the seller and I received  a response in less than 24 hours. Now that is Great support !! I have had several doctors comment on this app saying " Thats a Cool App" and they love the print out of all my medical history. With all the updates this app just keeps getting better and better. You can't beat the price of this app either.

Update: 08/18/2016
I have email the developer twice in the last week. 
I think this app has been ABANDONED by the developer..  It's such a shame..
Apple should do something about this, you pay for an app and then the developer either abandoned it or fines a new way to get more money out of you.. I don't mind paying for good apps, but ......getting rip off is a b......

name: My Medical
title: WTH?
text:
I had this loaded up w/ tons of data and now it's all gone. (With one of the updates.) 
What good is the ability to transfer your data if it's all deleted?

name: My Medical
title: All data lost and no response from developer. DO NOT BUY
text: I used this app faithfully for a year and really liked it, but when I tried to access it recently, all of my data was lost. I tried contacting the developer weeks ago but have yet to receive a response. This is extremely frustrating, especially from an app I paid for.

name: My Medical
title: Repeat from Ipad review - very good
text:
I bought this app to put all my medical info in a single place, and which I could easily share with medical professionals. This app does all that. Not surprisingly, the actual data entry is a pain, but that has nothing to do with the app. Finding all those pill bottles, blood tests, etc is necessary for this to work properly. (You can enter data from your address book effortlessly) But once the data is in, sharing and/or updating becomes easy. This is a smart app, in that it anticipates from already entered data what you may need when updating. I bought the iPad app to enter and keep the data up to date, and the iPhone app for ease of use and portability when visiting the doctor. Yes, you need to buy each. But syncing is easy. Once you're at a medical office, if you wold rather not narrate a record, you can just email it straight from the app to the medical office. In a couple of seconds, they have your info. 
BTW, support is great. I had a problem - turns out it was a user issue, not the app - and I had a support email back in a few hours with the correct solution. 
5 stars. Recommended. Update: what happened to syncing? This has become useless without the ability to keep all the devices sync'd.

name: My Medical
title: The app lags- slow or NO customer support
text: I was pleased with my medical. Now, the syncing is so slow. Each time I enter my blood glucose levels, the app lags. In other words, I have to wait over two minutes to do anything else in My Medical. Of course, that means I cannot use the app much. Since I paid to have this function and the synching, which also doesn't always work, the app gets a low rating from me. I wanted to love this app so badly. **customer support has not responded to concern- waited for over a year!

name: My Medical
title: Thank you
text: In our modern world, an app like this is sorely needed. While not perfect, I appreciate all the time and energy that's gone into this app. I find it useful and it works well.

name: My Medical
title: Love it!
text: I've had this app for a few years now. It's great! I have all my info including dr. contacts, rx information, plus much more. I would highly recommend it. Oh, I can also email my info to my dr or anyone else who needs it.

name: My Medical
title: iOS version does not sync with desktop version
text: Syncing works fine with my wife's MacBook and mine but it doesn't work at all with the iPhone version of this app. I'll update this review if syncing begins to work but until then I can't recommend it.

name: My Medical
title: What happened to this app?
text: I began using this app last year and really appreciated the comprehensiveness. However, today went to update and it won't open. Read another review of 14 Jan 2016 which states the developer has abandoned it. Grrrrrrrrr.....

name: My Medical
title: Stupid App
text: Don't waste your money. This is a stupid app that does nothing for you except wasting your money and time while frustrating you. It doesn't not have a chart as the picture shows. All the reviews are bogus, Apple needs to do a better job in weeding these apps that makes false function promise. It also crashes. Save your money and time and pass on this one.

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text: While I don't use every feature, I've found this app to be invaluable in helping me keep track of and remember my important health data. I use it to keep photos to share with my doctor as well as keep a diary-like timeline of medical events.

name: My Medical
title: Like it
text:
This is the first time I have tried to use an app for health records. It is comprehensive has a place for every kind of info. Have to add much by hand but then is portable record. Can be backed up, send/receive records, archive. Nice reference when on the road if needed. 
One problem is I added appointments for this year Nov 2015 but calendar shows them as 2013. Can't set the year to correct this. So this info = unreliable. No place to contact developer (?)!

name: My Medical
title: Won't update
text: It won't update as of October 17th.

name: My Medical
title: Terrible
text: App won't update with the October 9 update. It is now dead and useless.

name: My Medical
title: No Import capability from my 7 patient portals
text: Was hoping I could easily important my Blue Button data into this app so I didn't have to manually re enter it. Not an option, no direct message option and now I have to use Dropbox.

name: My Medical
title: Very helpful
text: I now can have all medical records at my fingertips -- great for doctor appointments, especially new patients. It makes it so easy to not just store all of your medical records and information, but also share it with anyone via email or hard copy. Also, the method of backing up info via email seems really smart, secure and private. And I love that it stores actual test result reports (PDFs).

name: My Medical
title: Customer Service
text: The app has great possibilities. What troubles me is if a problem is encountered such as syncing not working properly and information is lost you can’t get a response from the developer. This is very frustrating. I notified the developer that I was upset with the lack of response from tech support and would write a review to warn prospective buyers. I have not heard from them. Caveat emptor!

name: My Medical
title: No customer service!!!
text: Honestly,  the concept of this app is wonderful and works well on one device. The concept of syncing is a big mess.  I am technologically savy, however when I have reached the end of my expertise, I am looking for "expert" help. I completed entering my information, I went to sync between my devices and it duplicated each person by 10 times. I reached out to "my medical" over five times and they never reply. I have been waiting two months with no response.  Very disappointed and discouraging.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent App
text: Great means to track health & wish it had the track asthma triggers & inhaler use

name: My Medical
title: Love it!
text:
I bought this app when it first came out and it has been so useful to me when I go to the doctors. Love that all my important medical information and treatments can be stored in one app and the meds I take. 

Are you going to do anything with this app for the Apple watch?

name: My Medical
title: Tech support
text: My wife and I both us the app and have been very happy with it but recently my wife's copy of the app locked up - will not accept any entry. We have sent numerous help requests over last three weeks via their website but no response. So now our medical data is locked in the ether. Mymedical does not provide chat or phone contact info so future buyers and current users beware.

name: My Medical
title: Great app.
text:
This is the only medical information app I've kept. I've tried others, but only My Medical remains in use.

Fast, easy importing of notes, documents, photos. I import entries from DayOne when needed & have many lab reports I've scanned using the phone. I have all of my medically related photos in the app & it remained perfectly intact when I switched to a new phone. I wish all my other apps were as stable.

I have a good deal of information stored here so I really appreciate the fast navigation. If I need something during a doctor's appointment, I can find what I need in a few seconds & the doctors really appreciate that. It's very useful, has a clean, updated look & I'd recommend it to anyone.

I removed one star because there's not much in the way of linking information to each specific doctor or prescription - that would make it near perfect. However, that's never slowed things down when I needed it to perform at the last minute.

name: My Medical
title: Everything in One Organized Place and it Syncs Too
text: I am really thrilled with the Mac desktop version and the app which is on my iPhone, iPad and touch. All synced.  I had been using a silly Word doc to track all my shots, 3 Rxs, and office visits.  This is such a delight to use. So now I can think “Is my tetanus shot up-to-date” or "what that Rx I seldom use?" and the info is at hand.  Very, very helpful and I love that no one has my info.  I’d love an app just like this to track my financial info.

name: My Medical
title: Synch Issues
text:
I'm quite happy with the app after using it for a couple if years. One if it's nice features is (was) that it automatically enters office visits in my calendar through iCloud. Now, they're changing to DropBox so I will be changing to another app. If you are a fan of DropBox and aren't concerned by its security issues, this is a very useful app. If you're an iOS device user, not so much. You might want to keep looking. The one technical design change that I would recommend is the ability to easily move prescriptions from current to old status. Otherwise, it's a great way to track and record your medical information.
Update:
There is now a way to change the status of prescriptions from current to old. No problem. They keep saying that iCloud synch is going to be taken away but haven't done it so far, so I'll keep using it. If not for the iCloud vs. Dropbox issue, I would give this app 5 stars. It really is quite useful and well organized for health record maintenance.

name: My Medical
title: 5 Stars
text: Everything's in one place which comes in handy when one is asked for medical information. They've made it easy to share information. It takes only a little time and effort to catch on to the process of adding test results. Neat, clean and well organized. Well worth the cost.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text:
I have had my share of medical procedures. I have a lot of doctors. It is nice to have all your history available in one place.   I would like to see a couple of updates. Inside the app a red flag appears by the refill date prior to refill date. It is only noticed if you are in the app. It would be nice to have a flag show on the app screen that gives us a warning. 

I would also like to see a date when the script expires. You call the pharmacy and see you can't get last refill because it has expired delay getting a new script.

name: My Medical
title: Works only on Mac.  No sync with IPad or IPhone
text:
Well organized and helpful program. If only it would sync with IPad or IPhone!  Company will not reply to multiple requests to fix this problem.

Look elsewhere if you want to have your medical information available with you at your doctor's office.

name: My Medical
title: Love it!
text: I like that this app lets me add multiple people. Super helpful when my husband had cancer and when taking care of my Dad. Easy to look up info and add info.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
Works well if you're single but I've not yet figured out how to get entered data to sync with my wife's application.*

*(Have upped my review from 2 stars to 5 stars.  One must go to the App Store or Google Play to update the App.  It doesn't automatically update, at least not in the App Store.  Once this is done, data transfers easily).

name: My Medical
title: Pitiful!
text:
Wow this just might be the most pitiful company, and customer service I have ever run up against!
Especially considering what's at stake (one's health). 
This was the first sort of expensive premium app i ever purchased. 
I purchased two; one for my mac, one for my iPhone, 
with the  simple idea that they would communicate with each other.
 
i needed to go see my cardiologist this Monday morning armed with the proper information. 
I spent weeks and weeks collecting all my health data I needed to have prepared for him. 
I had an issue with the syncing; I'm using dropbox but the units weren't speak to each other.
I wrote to support asking for some advice on how to get the two apps to communicate; no response,
wait a couple days, ask again, nothing.

it's been 10 days now, and all i receive from them is the "acknowledgment of your email" response.

for those of you who are syncing properly, it appears to be a useful app,
but if you have even a small hiccup, consider this fair warning.
eric

name: My Medical
title: Mostly good
text: It keeps all of the data I need to reference - I just wish the list views tended to provide a more condensed, quick view - like you'd expect from a list. Otherwise, it's been rock solid. I can't tell you how often I've had this open at doctor's appointments.

name: My Medical
title: Love this App
text: I've been using this app and use it whenever I go to the doctors. I can list, take photos of scripts, etc. Great for medical records.

name: My Medical
title: Ok but-
text: This app tracks a lot of information, and that is what it's good at. Would like to see a summation of each person with their height weight etc and the export data cleaned up - just to look nicer and more appealing.

name: My Medical
title: Very satisfied
text: Keeps everything organized. The perfect app to keep track of all your vital statistics and your kids and families!! Secured with Touch ID too!!!

name: My Medical
title: My first review…
text:
I have been using My Medical on my Mac for a number of years. A few years ago I got an iPad and iPhone, and loaded the iOS versions on them. I use Dropbox syncing, as My Medical no longer accesses iCloud, and I have had no problems. 
   So far, I have used their Support for questions on the methods of handling some of the info. Last week, I emailed them with a suggestion which would handle Prescriptions and Current Medications more efficiently. I was very surprised that I had an answer the next day.
   So all-in-all, if asked, I would recommend this set of apps.

name: My Medical
title: Love this app, just one request
text: I'd love to have the option to add a family pet or pets. Also it would be nice to have the option to select family position (mom, dad, half sister, etc). Additionally if I were caring for a parent, it would be nice to add them in as well.

name: My Medical
title: Lost information
text:
This app has lost all my medical data twice since I purchased it a few years ago. 
Works for a few months and then all the data is gone. Very frustrating

name: My Medical
title: Mr.
text: Unstable app. You  will lose data and it has never been able to sync. I've used IOS 7 and 8 as well as iCloud (earlier) and Dropbox. It will not sync!

name: My Medical
title: Love!!!!
text: I can keep track of multiple patients and sync with other apple products !!!

name: My Medical
title: Not a cheap ap and there are already problems
text: I'm trying to set up on two iPhone 5s.  So, to save massive amount of time, wanted to 'send to device' so I don't have to type this all twice with the old hunt 'n' peck finger thing.  It's been 'looking for devices' on the network for 10 minutes now.  Waste of time.

name: My Medical
title: Was wonderful, now it crashes on launch
text: This was wonderful and my doctor was impressed. Now it crashes every time I try to launch it. 10 years of info frozen in an inaccessible app. And I wasn't trying to sync across devices, just kept it on my phone. Please fix it enough that I can extract the info and I'll find something else!

name: My Medical
title: Lost all my data
text: Loved it when it worked. Updated, and years' worth of doctor info, prescriptions, and illness history was gone. Very, very disappointed.

name: My Medical
title: I am terribly upset about this app
text: This has been a great app - it  hs everything I could possibly need.  it has always used iCloud as  backup but now they are changing to Dropbox..  well, Dropbox will not accept my password although it is totally accurate.  So if i update I will lose 50 years of info I have entered.  I also los it on a previous update.

name: My Medical
title: Long time user-- update screwed everything up!!
text:
I've been using this app since 2010 without any issues, until this update. 

Most of my information for "results" is in the "location" section and my other test results vanished. Four years of results: gone. 

What happened to this app?!

name: My Medical
title: Information gone
text: Spent a ton on time entering my medical information.  Now it is gone. Not only useless app but dangerous.  Where did my medical information go?  Who has it?

name: My Medical
title: Horrible APP and NO Support
text: I purchased this app to work with the previous version.  My data would not import from iCloud and the vendor has never responded to me frequent attempts for support to correct this issue.  I do NOT RECOMMEND purchase of My Medical, since at some point all your information may not show up, and you have to resort back to all the paper copies.

name: My Medical
title: Best medical app
text: My medical allows you to keep all of your medical records at your fingertips.  From office visits, surgeries, medicines currently taking or taken in the past, tests to insurance information... you have any or all of yours or a family member's information when you need it.

name: My Medical
title: Mrs
text:
Great app!!!!
Showed it to my doctor she loved it too !!!

name: My Medical
title: Nice app with poor design
text: Nice app, it only needs a deep and nice redesign... Icon included, it's just awful.

name: My Medical
title: Great vaccine tracker
text: I have been using this for a few years now, and love it. I can track vaccines and other medical information for all of my family members. It stores backup information a folder in my own Dropbox account, which makes me feel confident that my information won't get lost with a bad software revision or if they were to go out of business or something.

name: My Medical
title: Used to be good
text: I used this app a lot when it used iCloud but now it crashes and just doesn't work.  Recently lost all my data.  Too bad.  It has potential.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent Medical Database
text:
I really like this app. It has a couple of weak points, but overall it is wonderful for storing all kinds of medical information. I have versions on my Mac, iPad, and iPhone. 

Recently I was in a doctor's office and the nurse was asking my about medications. I pulled out my iPhone and opened My Medical and showed her the list. She was in awe, and said "why can't everyone do that?"

The only complaint I have is about syncing (hence the 4 stars). Syncing is via Dropbox, which is fine. However, there are times when new entries don't sync or take a long time to sync (like 24 hrs or more). Other times new entries will sync within minutes or even seconds. If something doesn't sync, you can transfer the info by exporting over WiFi, but you have to do this for each device individually.  If they can fix this, the app would be perfect.

name: My Medical
title: Very happy with app
text: Good app, serves all basic needs.

name: My Medical
title: Disappointed
text: Your very latest update is terrible.  I originally loved this app, but with each new update, it has gotten worse.    I can't rearrange categories anymore.  There is no "edit" on the category screen.  Some features are good, but your changes were not for the better.  I am disappointed in the latest update.  I can't change background, can't rearrange categories, and when I went into FAQ, tapped on a question, the answer came up for a split second and then disappeared.  Could not get answers.  Please fix these bugs.

name: My Medical
title: Lost all my data
text: I turned on Dropbox and the app ended up creating 4 records with duplicated data.  And then 4 without any data but my pass code saved.  Unfortunately I had just entered a significant amount of data and hadn't backed it up.   It was hard to enter a lot of data, the user interface isn't really designed for iPhone or iPad  well.  It's more of a MacBook app I think.  I won't be keeping data there anymore. Excel is better.

name: My Medical
title: Ok but could be better
text: Read the review of this app on their website & was very impressed by the features. Would prefer to "try before the buy" but bought it based on the website descriptions & reviews. However, disappointed by it. It lacks the "coolness" of its website descriptions. Would like to be able to upload to each Office Visit the test results/ documentation discussed--a la Evernote or Awesome Note. Was not worth the price.

name: My Medical
title: Update needs some work
text: Love this app in general but it's not as polished as it was pre-update. Crashes randomly. And you can no longer choose a theme. Hope that option comes back in an update.

name: My Medical
title: IOS 7 Update Nicely Done
text:
After Google Health shut down I had to scramble to find a replacement. I’ve been using this app for about a year now and it does a great job helping me keep track of my medical related activities. It is very comprehensive and organized. I am able to document everything. 

I have tried several medical apps since Google Health and I have finally settled on this one as it is the best. 

The IOS 7 update makes it very pleasing on ones eyes.

name: My Medical
title: Really Nice
text: Overall it's a nice app, I actually use it for my dogs since I can't find a decent medical app for them. With that said, I wish you could remove or hide certain categories but other than that, it's great.

name: My Medical
title: Good concept
text:
Good app. A few things I would like to see.

- iCloud sync
- A website to edit info instead of JUST mobile
- Allow file import for scanned documents

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
1 - Discontinuing sysching with Icloud
2 - Difficult to navigate 
3 - Difficult to Edit records, would be nice to have ON-line access to medical files to easire edit
4 - Terminolgy (Sections) don't contain easy to use Names, titles, section ID's, etc.

name: My Medical
title: Suggestions
text:
I just started using this app in February 2014. Seems okay, most reviewers that have been using an app of this type seem to love it over others that are available. 
 Two suggestions that I'd like to see. The first one is searchability, it would be nice to search a term, or search for a doctor, or search for something you know has been filed, you're just not sure where it was filed.
My second suggestion would be:  When adding information such as blood pressure in test and procedures, it would be nice if we could have that test with our default unit. 
For example- Currently when adding blood-pressure I have to go and add the number then I have to click on units and find mmHg. It would be so much easier if I could set mmHg as my standard for this input. Another example would be heart rate, having to select bpm, slows down the input of information.
Please give your app the ability to have our predetermined units show up by default on these tests and procedures.

name: My Medical
title: No iCloud support?!?!?
text: The only reason I bought this app is because it promised iCloud support for seamless integration between all of my devices that is secure and that I don't have to think about. Yet every release you force your users off of iCloud and onto Dropbox. I don't want to have to use a third party app for syncing!!! Please get your act together and figure out iCloud support as promised!!

name: My Medical
title: AWSOME !
text: Have used this app for about 6 months and it is great. Once all my data was entered I have everything at my disposal. When going to the doctor I can email them any information right in the spot which is much easier and more accurate than having to go by memory. Super app!  High recommend !!

name: My Medical
title: I love it !!
text:
Nice to have all records, yours & family, in one place. Especially for "new patient" check in! Also, for elderly parents, to help at Dr. appts., etc... I even use it for my kids (pets)!
1 - Have "history" section. There is the "family hx.", but not place for yours? And in a "check the box" fashion like new patient form.
2 - I would like to be able to rearrange front page. As add someone, they go to the top. I want mine always at top. For med personnel to find easily.
3 - For "Family Hx."; have boxes to check for common things, like on new patient form. Typing them all in is a "pain".
4 - Have a Top 3, to choose to have at top in red, like the "Emergency Contacts". So medical personnel can find most important info first!
ie: Contacts, Allergies, Conditions/Hx.

But, basically Love It !!  Thanx !!

name: My Medical
title: Won't work after iOS 7 update
text: Used this exclusively for last 2+ years for family if six. After iOS 7, all data has been lost, app continuously crashes, and won't even stay open long enough to email their support link.

name: My Medical
title: Crashes
text: Loved this app. Updated it and synced with iCloud. Now the app opens briefly then crashes. My info doesn't show up either. Please fix.

name: My Medical
title: Keeps Crashing
text:
iPhone 5S. I used this successfully on my iPhone 4S. Now, on my new iPhone 5S it keeps crashing to the point where I cannot enter information!  Please fix!  I have now tried downloading and reinstalling this app again but it still crashes.  I am regretfully deleting this app until you fix this problem.  I still use it on my old iPod, but that device is dying and is not going to be available
to me much longer. 
Also, you have provision for people with visual limitations. Please add provision for those of us with limited hearing. Thank you.

name: My Medical
title: Just Crashes Now
text: Just installed the last update. All my information is gone and app keeps crashing. This app hasn't worked right for awhile now and keeps getting worse with each update. I'm now looking for another app to store my medical info in if anybody has any suggestions.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: As a caretaker for parents it is perfect to have medical info on my phone in case of emergency

name: My Medical
title: Great App

The only options are Settings and Help. And that's when it doesn't crash on me. Which it seems to do w/in 15 sec every time I try it.

name: My Medical

text:
I've used this app for some time, and was impressed with its comprehensiveness. However, since the iOS7 upgrade, the app crashes constantly, rendering it useless to me.
I love this app: I hope they fix it soon.

Second edit: Still no support, company refuses to fix app I PAID for.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent as Before
