name: My Medical
title: Lost in space
text: The system was working great then three days ago nothing. I can't log into my information. When I try to get in, the site just closes. I sent help reports to the application website but have not heard from them. All my medical information for the past year is gone. I can understand problems happen but to not respond to request for help is not expectable.

name: My Medical
title: When the in the Dr office or ER this has save my memory
text:
For the past two years my spouses medical history has been piling up.  There was so much information that a Dr yelled at me because I wasn't able to give him important information.
I am now on top of it.  On our last trip to the ER, the nurse's and Dr were impressed that I was able to provide them with so much information.
My fav feature; that I can sync it with my spouse's phone in less than a min.

name: My Medical
title: Now I'm not so happy- revised rating
text: I originally gave this app 5 stars because it functioned so well. Then my dad bought this app, because I liked it so much, and put it on his phone. He tried using the web site and import function for data entry, and we have had nothing but problems. Data appears to not import, but we have found that tapping on random buttons, like Edit while in the Allergies section will make the data appear. Dad could not get Physicians imported, and decided to do a search for them, and they appeared all of a sudden. We are both seeing the same problems, so it's not user error. Don't understand. The first night I used the web site for data entry, it was flawless. Now, it is useless. I've reported these problems, and the developer responded promptly. Hope they straighten it out soon.

name: My Medical
title: Wow
text: This app is amazing!!

name: My Medical
title: Nice App.... Now a desktop version to sync to
text: Nice app for my iTouch .... just wish there was a desk top version to sync with.

name: My Medical
title: 10 STARS from the nurse!
text:
As a nurse, I find this app extremely useful and easy to use! 

A great, easy to use app!

name: My Medical
title: Best App EVER!
text: I am a frequent visitor to the ER and hospital.  This app allows me to have my info instantly and the doctors and nurses love it.  I had one ER doc download it on the spot he was so impressed.  However, for it to be great you must input your info.

name: My Medical
title: Great App!
text: The best app we have ever purchased. Incredibly intuitive, powerful and simple to use. We rely on our adult son to help us and were delighted to be able to set this app up by ourselves. Son is delighted that we can share all of our information reliably between him and our doctors. I am hoping our doctors will recommend this to their patients as this kind of simplified communication could prevent the kind of misinformation that complicates eldercare.

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text: This is the best App for keeping track of ALL medical information. Only wish you could print all the information.

name: My Medical
title: Beautiful App
text:
Very nice, indeed. Use it everyday for my meds. 
There is a big bug though. Remaining pills are calculated not based on actual usage, but based on schedule, I guess.

name: My Medical
title: The best of the pick
text:
Spent a lot of time researching the various Apps that will allow you easily to enter your medical data/history - ideally away from the iPhone itself (too much tiny typing!) - and have it all instantly and simply available, well-arranged yet secure.

My Medical seemed the best… comprehensive; good reviews with respect to its stability; appealing interface; ease of use and so on.

It became obvious within less than five minutes that such other reviews were accurate.

The system of being able to copy and paste text etc into a form on the developer's website (which then emails My Medical owners a link via an iPhone mail account - click it and data is entered faultlessly into the App) was particularly appealing.

Further, the App really does allow you to commit a usefully rich range of medical data - and for multiple users, family members, those one cares for etc.

Support from the developer is quick, helpful and friendly.

There certainly appears to be no other App so comprehensive, easy to use, reliable and well-supported as My Medical. Excellent value!

name: My Medical
title: Suggestion
text: So far, I think this app will be a great addition to my iPhone. However, since I will be using it mainly to keep track of my little ones, I would love to see a growth chart added!

name: My Medical
title: Review
text: It's a very helpful and easy to use app. It's great when I go to doctors appts and need to retrieve information or to document information for tests at appts and to have the information right there with me

name: My Medical
title: Great app by Great Doc!
text: Imagine my surprise to have this app recommended to me by a friend to find out it us written by a doc that literally changed my life by sending me to the best neurosurgeon! WTG dr Chaitoff!

name: My Medical
title: Cant add new info??
text: I can't add any new tests or hospital info lately?? Screens won't open?  Help/ upgrade fix!?

name: My Medical
title: Excellent App
text: I have been looking for a medical app that contains features that I needed and that was also flexible.  I found that more from this app. I love this app,  I use it all the time to keep track of all my appointments,medicine, etc.  what I like about this app, is that I take photos.  Great App.  I highly recommend that everyone gets this app. I am.

name: My Medical
title: Get this !!!
text: This app has made my life so much easier. I used to carry around binders for each family member with all their medical info. Now, it is all in one place and I can access it all in one click!

name: My Medical
title: Excellent
text: Excellent app and easy to master.  It is far superior to the more expensive "Health n Family" app.

name: My Medical
title: A must have!
text: I have a severe medical condition and i cant remember all the information i need and this app solves all that..Definately reccommend this app..It may save your life

name: My Medical
title: Very nice App. I'm impressed.
text:
I used the email feature to send my Meds & conditions to my computer so I could print them out for a doctor visit.

I like the way the information is displayed.

My only wish is that it had a built in library of Meds and Conditions that would pop up as you type.  But that would only be on my wish list, it in no way detracts from the form or function of this app.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: No way anyone can go wrong,(love the "emergency" button!) for contact info.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This app is a great way to have all of your medical records on you at all times. You can put copies of your blood tests, radiology reports and doctors visit summaries in the app as well as other medical history information, including your prescription medications. The only shortcoming is that the copies are identified only by date. An ability to label the photoed info would allow instant recognition of the report you need to pull up. Today's app update retained all the information I previously had in the app.

name: My Medical
title: Review
text: Pretty good app.  Only complaint is that the medication part isn't intuitive.

name: My Medical
title: As a medical professional this is fantastic!
text: I wish my patients all had this app with all of their medical info, prescriptions, and doctors at their fingertips when they come to see me. I love that your info is not stored online.  My only request is that appointments are stored with their times.  Buy this, use this, and please spread the word to all of your friends and family!  Your medical professionals will love you for it.

name: My Medical
title: Just the best there is !!!
text: It didn't take long after I started entering my data for the last 8 years until I realized what a powerful ap this is -- everything I was looking for and more!  I was amazed at how thorough and well-organized the various blood test results presets were, and how easy it was to add other types of tests that discern they are numerical and generate graphs just like the pre-sets.  Outstanding work there Steven Chaitoff, I feel like I owe you more than the $1.99 I was charged for this little jewel.

name: My Medical
title: This App Rocks
text: After trying a fairly good program that the developers stopped supporting, I was thrilled to find this App. The other program was run through Google Health and I could not change the information within the App. My Medical keeps the information on your phone and the interface is easy to learn and easy to use. I agree with a prior review that suggested there be a prescription database which would offer suggestions based upon the first few letters typed. I am keeping my entire family's medical information, including my Mother's in the program. I also like the fact that you can share the data with other family members who have the program and with your physician. Great job!

name: My Medical
title: Good application but can be better
text:
I like this application a lot.  I like the easy intuitive display, the ability to track both current and past medications.  The ability to track immunizations.  I am tracking my whole family--even tracking my dog's health.  Here are 2 things that would make it even better:
1)  The current medications should be easy to transfer into the past medications area without having to enter all the information all over again.  I have not found a way to do this and it should be easy to do.
2)  It would be nice for the program to have the medications set up so that you enter the first few letters and the name of the medicine comes out.
Over all a very good application.  I think the above would make it a great application.

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic
text: Wonderful for keeping and maintaining medical info that one needs but doesn't have memorized due to infrequent use. Definitely will come in handy when I need to fill forms or even sending a copy of inputted records to my doctors. Highly recommend this app to anyone!!!

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful useful app!!!
text: I have a chronic illness that requires I keep up with many medications, procedures, and physicians. This has allowed me to keep all this info updated and handy. I recently had to go to the hospital and was having difficulty giving my medical history to the nurses and physicians. I was able to direct them to this app abd they wre able to get everything they needed while I was able to go on getting tge help I needed. It was a life saver and the EMTs and physicians were really impressed with the app. A MUST fir anyone who may need regular medical assistance. I've showed it to everyone I know and they all think it's amazing! Totally worth the price!!!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Looks promising
text:
Needed an app to keep track of medical info, and this looks simplified, direct-to-the-point and well thought-out. Rated it 4 stars because of two things:

1. There is no sorting function for the main page for the person. I'd like to put physicians before past medications, for example. 

2. One can only synchronize appointments with calendar; it would be nice if we had options to sync with other organizing apps (in my case, it's 2Do). 

Hint, hint app creator! We need these updates stat! Otherwise, a great app!

name: My Medical
title: Like it....
text: First impression is that, like an emergency call, if this information could be accessed from your password protected screen, rescuers could access if you were incapacitated. Just a thought.

name: My Medical
title: Doc.
text: My medical is one of the best I have used in a long time. Will tell my family and friends about it.

name: My Medical
title: Get this App
text: As a Nurse and former Paramedic, i can tell you no one expects an Emergency and when it does their memories turn to Jell-O.  This App has the ability to provide your important medical history that could save your life.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: Fantastic personal health record app.  Has an incredible amount of features - most of which I will never use.  Very well done, and the developer is constantly updating.  Bravo!

name: My Medical
title: Good
text: Good...but needs improvement. Max and mins should show up on graphs. Test that are done frequently like blood pressure need to be accessible on first page. More direct entry is needed for HDL, LDL, Ratios, etc. Add immunization and medical tests recommendations with due dates by gender. Also add PSA testing for men and other special female testing needs.

name: My Medical
title: Look no further.  There is nothing better.
text:
For some time I have been looking for a comprehensive and detailed app to monitor my labs and medication adjustments, and a chronology of doctor and hospital visits for my aging mother.  Since I travel a lot I often need this info. at my fingertips. Well a friend sent me an article in a weekly paper that highlighted the iphone app called My Medical. I cannot be more pleased. For one thing, I can add my whole family to the app. I have myself, my mother, my husband (and I'm on his iPhone after I told him to get this app). I even have our two dogs. It may sound crazy, but it's important to have their information like anyone else's.

The second thing that sets the My Medical app apart from any other is the way it is organized. The layout is simply wonderful and wonderfully simple. There is nothing to learn. Everything is in precisely the right place and at the same time, it seems to include everything I could possibly need. And that is no simple feat. I've tried other apps like this and they either don't do enough or they're utterly impossible to use. I love that I can list my meds separately from my previous history. I love charting out my weight...when it's going down :)  The form to email off various sections to my internist is priceless.  There are so many other gems inside this app that I cannot mention them all. You just need to try it for yourself. You will not be disappointed.

name: My Medical
title: Updates loses Info
text: When I first downloaded this App I was very excited. It does have some good points and some bad points. First, for the bad points. When you have an update on this app you lose all your Information and than have to type it all back in again. This did not make me very happy as I have a lot of info to enter. Second, for the good points of this app. The app does have a lot of areas to add your Medical History. It would be very helpful that the next time you have an update you make it so you don't lose all your information and than have to type it all back into the app.

name: My Medical
title: Lost it
text: Spend some time loading information, then it disappeared. Don't waste your time

name: My Medical
title: This is a must have app!
text:
I use on both iPhone & iPad and am anxiously waiting for a mac app.
It's clean & easy to use. Love that I can  use filters to create a report & then email it (great for getting a new doctor up to speed).

name: My Medical
title: I love this app!
text: Is just great, thanks!

name: My Medical
title: Backup does not work
text: If you have a iTouch this not the program for you. You must be able to email to back up program. Glad I only had a couple of things entered when I found this out.

name: My Medical
title: Cool app
text: But latest update adds a 1-day alert in your calendar and there's no way to turn it off. Please fix this

name: My Medical
title: Enter Least Important Info First
text: Love this app being able to go to the Web site to enter and then email it to your phone to download it!!  Just know that for some odd reason in a list it downloads the last first and the first last.  I'm also going to put my Mom's and my puppy dog's info in here.

name: My Medical
title: I'm am loved #1
text: Take care of yourself  w/this app alot of things you might have forgotten is in the palm of your hand ! If you are injured or close to death vital records are the only chance at life u have. #1 app u should get . Takes care of your whole family!! And loved ones.

name: My Medical
text: This makes my life that much easier. I wish I would of gotten it sooner.

name: My Medical
title: The BEST
text: This is the best medical information keeper in the app store. All your info is in one place, makes filling out the forms for your first Dr appointment a snap, no more guessing about dates, procedures, medications. Heck just send it via email!! Thanks for  a great app.

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text: Great app. I love the graphs for BP, weight, and blood sugar. Customer support is very responsive. RH

name: My Medical
title: Meets all my needs
text: So far this product offers every feature that I have wanted and i have not noticed a bug yet.  Cool features include emergency contacts from contacts, password lock, easy move of prescription from current to past, etc. Great app!

name: My Medical
title: Awesome app
text: One awesome app. I love logging in my medical test and seeing the graphs. Did show my doc this, and even had  e-mailed him some of the test graphs. Easy to use. Even keeps tract of doc appointments.  One awesome app

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This app is very easy to use, great user interface.  Especially liked how you can update your records from the website, and then email it to yourself on your phone.  Then you just open the email on your phone, and it automatically updates your app.  Has subjects for a variety of health records, and was able to enter all my information in it.  Very reasonable price for all it includes.

name: My Medical
title: Sharing Data with Another Device Missing on current version?
text: I've used this app for some time now.  It has been handy to share data with other family members, especially when they also have this app. However, the newest version  (2.1) appears to be missing this capability. The support site indicates, "[i]n the app, tap "Back Up or Send to Another Device" and fill out the "To:" field . . . ."  However, the newest version only lists "Create a Backup".  If you create a backup and click on the link received in an email, it will "restore" your database instead of adding to it.  This needs to be resolved quickly. Note one can exchange data between to phones with the app via Wi-Fi.

name: My Medical
title: Great
text: Great to have. Keeps doctors stuff in on place. You will know when your last flu shot and more.

name: My Medical
title: Very Helpful App. ...really saved my but!!!!
text:
Luckily I got this app about a month before I knew how much I was going to need it! I entered all the info, which was a bit of a major pain, and about two weeks later, I was admitted to the emergency room with an infection. 

This app was an absolute "God Send" The ER staff had all my Med list, my Primary Care MD, all my insurance info, everything they needed! Since then I've used it a dozen more times when I've gone to my eye doctor's office, or to verify prescriptions, at the drug store!

I'd highly recommend this app! You can keep not only your records, but spouses, parents , and kids records as well, including Meds,  Doctors , and contact/allergy info, ...basically anything you can think of!

name: My Medical
title: Great App I Would Recommend
text: I am currently caring for an elderly mother and uncle.  It is great to have a list of medication and health history for them. I love that you can have multiple people listed. It makes filling paperwork at the Dr.'s office so much easier and to have all this information at your finger tips in an emergency.

name: My Medical
title: THE BEST personal medical app i have used
text: this app is the BEST designed and thought out app of its type.  it is straight forward and contains everything that a patient would need to have when seeing their doctor.  the fact that the data STAYS with the patient and doesn't go into "the cloud" is a definite plus.  being able to send a summary report, or just a partial report, via email ensures that there are no misinterpretations of handwritten notes.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful
text: I love keeping my doctors' contact info, kids' immunization records, and family medical history all in one place.  Plus all our medications, procedures, hospitilizations, etc. etc. etc.  It is great that you can enter your data through the website and send it to your iphone for immediate input.  I also got a comprehensive, super-fast response to my e-mail question.

name: My Medical
title: Wow.  Excellent app.
text:
This is quite an app.  Very much worth the $3.  I'm impressed to see that most of the suggestions in older reviews have already been implemented in the app.  For the people who couldn't get password protection to switch on: I had to restart my phone, but then it worked fine from then on. 

I have one suggestion for now.  The app is mostly great with merging in new data you enter using the website, but there is a problem with resolving conflicts.  If you happened to slightly change an entry both on your phone and in the web interface, the app doesn't let you know, or prompt you to resolve the conflict, it just creates two records that are slightly different.  It can get extremely annoying trying to pick out the correct details manually from multiple records.  Small issue in an otherwise fantastic and clearly well-supported app.

name: My Medical
title: totally worth it
text: this is app is so worth $3... my husband and i have quite a few health problems, were on about 30 medications and have many doctors, this app helps us keep track of all this and so MUCH MORE.... its a very extremely useful app. only thing i would add is foods to avoid for certain health problems then it would be perfect for everything but they do have other apps for that so no worries.

name: My Medical
title: Great buy
text: Please add an alarm feature for meds to be taken, ability to organize the ranking of the users on the main screen and more themes too. Thank you

name: My Medical
title: littleNuz
text: I just started using the app and so far so good! I'm a nurse so I know how important it is to have all of this information readily available. I'm just wondering if there is a way to simply put the year of a sugery/test/procedure if you do not remember the exact date??

name: My Medical
title: Is it really this good? YES
text:
I've been tracking these vitals in a combination of Excel, Access and Word, BP tracking apps, etc...  This app has it all in one place.  I really like the feature that if entering multiple meds, the Prescription information, once entered in Current Medications, is just a click away for repeat entries (ie. same pharmacy).  Makes data entry quick and easy.  Graphs are easy to read, emailed reports are very logically organized and readable (not just a raw data-dump of the information).  If you need to track yours or family members vitals, this is the app to get!  This app alone saved me money on several stand-alone (specific to a given vital record) tracking apps I was looking at.

Password protection is important and I like the fact that even when it's locked, if someone finds you and your phone, they can access the Emergency contact information without a password.

4 stars because I would like to see it lock on exit (unless it's an iPhone 4 multitask thing I haven't figured out yet).  I have to quit using the double-click and minus, otherwise everytime I just return the home screen and come back it's still unlocked.

Edit: I just changed to 5 Stars because I just discovered you can email yourself a backup should something happen the phone or the data file.  Crucial for an app of this type.

name: My Medical
title: Must have Medical app.
text: I was diagnosed with multiple tumor sites last Summer, been to a mired of Drs. since. Great for keeping track of all the appointments, tests,  and results.  Only gripe I have is some Drs. won't let you E-mail to them.

name: My Medical
title: Best medical records app
text: This is the best and most comprehensive personal records iPhone app!  The interface is attractive, yet user-friendly and logical.  Entering and editing data are easy. I also love the iPad version and how it resembles a medical chart folder!  My only suggestion would be to have a desktop version.

name: My Medical
title: Awesome
text: I love this app. It helps me keep everyones medical information straight.

name: My Medical
title: Detailed records + pics!
text:
I've been looking for a way to add photos of each individual pill to correspond to the large list of medications I keep track of for my lovely 82 year old Mother and this App was the answer. She knows her pills well, but as the years come, I needed a visual record. 
I looked for the past week at all other Apps both free and for purchase. I read the reviews. I even downloaded some free ones to try. None compared to My Medical. I just finished entering the list online and emailed it to myself. Worked GREAT! My list was long, 45min, so this feature was also an influential factor. 
I'm happy to recommend this to anyone and thank you for a well thought out and constructed iPhone App. Well worth it!

name: My Medical
title: What happened?
text: Used to be great, but all the sudden all of my data got erased and it says it can't load. Try to create new profile and whole program crashes!!! What's going on? Please fix

name: My Medical
title: totally cool!
text: SOOO easy to enter info from your computer and send it to your iPod (or whatever) via email. Easy to update. Endless number of entries for medications, doctors, etc. Could do without the automatic calendar to enter a date. Tried a few other similar apps and they weren't anywhere near as comprehensive or flexible, or easy to use.

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text:
Better than similar apps.  Wish I could add my son's birth measurements and milestones so that I can delete the other medical apps.  

Also, wish the app would show my son's age for each entry.

name: My Medical
title: A must
text: I wish I had this app when I was taking care of our parents.  How many times did I have to tell a new Dr. what the meds were!   It us also great to have the info about your children.

name: My Medical
title: Worth every penny!!
text: This is the medical history app you've been looking for. I can't think of anything it lacks. You guys did a great job on this app. Thank you!

name: My Medical
title: GREAT APP !!
text:
I've been hoping to find a good App that can keep be a comprehensive HEALTH RECORD with all that this one has.... Extremely well thought out and laid out ... Very User Friendly too.
The only thing I am really hoping for in an update, is more variety in the graphs...ie., the ability to combine graphs onto one screen. But highly recommend this App!!

name: My Medical
title: Very useful. Well conceived & executed.
text:
I have been trying to keep all my medical info together by using my calendar, my To Do list and Documents to Go.  It was starting to become very unmanageable. I found this app in the nick of time. I am pleased with its concept, function and design. The e-mail entry and backup is an essential component. Charting is a nice feature as well.

I had a small hiccup with pharmacy phone numbers.  When I would attempt to add a pharmacy phone number to prescriptions I was faced with a list of six numbers and could not figure out which number was for which pharmacy.  Then I re-entered all the info with the number first and name following it so I could choose the appropriate number.

I needed somewhere to enter an expiration date for prescriptions and e-mailed Steven, the developer.  I received a reply within a few hours and found out that it is already in the works for the next update!  Also an alert for upcoming expiration dates is coming.  Six stars!   

One other wish I have would be for an extra field for notes to give a little more flexibility.  That would be seven stars!   

This app is well worth the price.  Very good product with excellent support.

name: My Medical
title: Updated super fast
text: iOS 4 update caused a problem but was immediately fixed.  App is great for keeping everyone's info together and ready to use.  One of my most used apps.

name: My Medical
title: Great app for medical records!
text: Love the great support staff for this app!!! Emailed my question and got my answer back super fast!! The instructions worked and now I have Buddy's name on his medical records! Thanks much!!

name: My Medical
title: forty-five minutes of typing into the web site ...
text: ... and it dumps all of it when i tried to send my data via email. stay away in droves.

name: My Medical
title: I wish lists were preloaded.
text: This app is fine. No bells, a little high price for such basic functionality. Easy to navigate and use. It would be nice if there were some pre-loaded choices though.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical crashed right after I installed an update...
text:
I LOVE MyMedical. However, after the latest update, I can only get to the summary screen and the text list of what I entered. I can't get to my
data to email my prescription drug list to myself for my doctor visits!  I tried a re-sync of the iPhone, that didn't fix it. Next step?

name: My Medical
title: Love it
text: Lobe the app but can't seem to get the password to work and that wad a big sellin point for me can some one help me :/

name: My Medical
title: Best personal medical data collector and data base.
text: Title says it all. Easy to use. Data can be backed and or sent via e-mail. Well worth the modest cost.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical is my medical APP
text: Excellent APP for tracking and record keeping. Also works to plan questions for Doctor at next visit. Love the new syncing "merge". There could be a little more flexibility on sorting test results ... like chronological. I realize the chart does, but in list form. By the way, great responsive support too as my wife and I have received responses immediately from developer.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: Pretty handy.  I like that it pulls info from my contacts for doctors.  Handy to have my husband's and my info in one spot.

name: My Medical
title: This App is a Must
text: This App is a must if you have a medical encyclopedia of information about your helth to remember as I do.

name: My Medical
title: The BMW of Personal Medical Record Apps
text: I purchased other apps in this category and found them lacking in one way or the other.  This app is thoughtful and thorough.  With the newest update which allows you to enter data from your Mac or PC, the tedium of data entry on an iPhone has been removed.  The developer has thought of it all!  You will be very happy with this purchase.  Absolutely no buyers remorse!  Your medical doctors will be very impressed. Filling out the dreaded medical info on the clipboard at your NEW doctor's office will be much, much easier.  Some medical offices might even let you email the information to them.  Apps like this are the reason my iPhone is indispensable.

name: My Medical
title: Great tool!
text: I use this all the time.

name: My Medical
title: A Must Have!
text: This app is great--a must have. Very complete options for record keeping. My doctor was impressed. Has been extremely helpful in filling out forms and answering questions on several occasions. The best I've found!

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: This is a GREAT app! My medical history is complicated and there's too much to try to recall when some medical person is firing questions at me. One wonderful feature of this app is the ability to enter massive amounts of information on your desktop, then import it into the iPod. Thst is much easier than doing a lot of data entry using the iPods screen. Now when I'm being questioned, I can respond with accurate information. Thank you Steve for producing a dynomite app!

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful!
text: This is an AWESOME app! I recommend it to everyone. And a big thank you to the author, Steven. He updated it quickly right after the OS 4 Apple update. Thanks, Steven.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical is a GREAT application
text: It meets all my needs including exportation. When Apple's OS 4 broke the application, the developer responded to me within HOURS and was able to fix the issue within just 2 days. Great response time. Thanks!

name: My Medical
title: Can't Access Since OS Upgrade
text: Was an excellent application, but now is usless because it crashes whenever data is accessed.  This started after OS upgrade.  Need to fix application.

name: My Medical
title: Fix the bug
text: I love this app but since I updated the software on my iPhone, I can't access my information. It will kick me out. Please fix it, I was happy with this app.

name: My Medical
title: Crashing after iOS 4 Upgrade!!!!!!
text: Help!!!!!!! I just upgraded to iOS 4, the new system, and now I have NO ACCESS to ANY of my medical records!!!!!!!!! Make sure you send yourself a copy of your medical files BEFORE you do the upgrade!!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Can't see info after updating to iOS 4
text: Ever since the update I can't get to my info to edit. It keeps crashing. Anyone else having this problem? Please send update.

name: My Medical
title: Great organizational tool
text: I love, love, love this app. As a wife and mother, I love having all our medical info in one place that I can take with me!  It keeps everything clear and ready for insurance application time or necessary info at an office visit. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I agree with another reviewer that it can be a bit redundant. It would be nice if you could just put something in one place and then have the app distribute the pieces of info into appropriate categories. But I love that it can be printed, emailed and worked on online at the website. Great. Thanks.

name: My Medical
title: GREAT APP
text: I'VE BROWSING DIFFERENT APPS AND BY FAR THIS APP STANDS OUT FROM THE REST.  THIS IS DEFINETLY A NEED IN MY FAMILY.  I HAVE READ ALL OF YOUR REVIEWS AND I LOVE THE WAY YOU DID YOUR BEST TO SATISFY THE CLIENTS.  GREAT WORK.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful Timesaving App
text: This is a great app! As a mom and wife, this app is exactly what I was looking for. There used to be a time when I could keep all the different medical information straight...because it was just me and my husband. Now that we have added three children to the mix, it's getting to be a little difficult to remember who received what shot when and when did I have my knee operated on?? The website makes it very easy to enter large amounts of data. The e-mail feature comes right to my phone and imports effortlessly! I had a suggestion of having additional sorting options and the app developer got back to me with hours!! Overall, I am very well pleased.

name: My Medical
title: Fabulous app & outstanding developer!
text:
This app is worth ten times what I paid. I've put in a couple requests to the developer and he is very willing to add more features. 

If you can't remember all your medical history then this is the app for you.

All of my suggestions, along with MANY more, have turned this app truly outstanding. The developer has responded immediately to all my questions.

name: My Medical
title: Too redundant
text: The idea behind this app is great, however I find myself entering the same information several times due to the layout.  Why do you need three areas to record medication?  Medications, prescriptions and past meds should be combined into one.  Also should diagnoses and injury/illness.  Also, I attempted to use the website form and it did not work.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
Are you sick of filling out forms every time you visit a medical professional?  Then this app is for you. It is an absolutely wonderful application. Keep track of all your medical information in one place. Print it out, email it to your physician, or just take you handheld device to the doctor's office with you and refer to it when necessary. You can fill all the information out on  your desktop and the information is emailed to your device and imported to the app.

The support for this application is prompt and personal. There are no problems the team ignores. I strongly urge everyone to download and use this application.

name: My Medical
title: GREAT app!
text: I love this app!  It has everything I need.  I looked through dozens of apps and was unsure of which one to get.  But then I found My Medical and it was like getting 3 apps in 1!  It really is all inclusive!  So glad I bought it!  Can't wait to see updates in the future, I'm sure it will make this app even better!

name: My Medical
title: MyMedical is awesome!
text: This is a great tool to keep your whole familiy's medical info in one spot. Highly recommend!

name: My Medical
title: Horrible!!!!
text:
I went to the website to fill I'm ALL of the information and then sent it to my iPhone only for NONE of the information to come over to the phone!

Do NOT waste your money!

name: My Medical
title: Best app ever
text: This program has made it so much easier to keep everything about my husband and 5 kids in order and always at my fingertips

name: My Medical
title: Pretty Darned Good - Mr. Developer, a suggestion?
text:
Though it took me a while, I got all my info entered into the App. It will come in handy at all the doctor appts I have.

It would be nice to track all bloodwork like you track cholesterol. Specifically thyroid bloodwork - TSH, T4, T3, Free T4 and Free T3 so it can graph like the cholesterol. 

Also, to have docs entered into the app populate as a contact as well.

otherwise, nice, solid app!

name: My Medical
title: Mr
text: I love this it is best thang ever I wish I found it sooner It Need more Info

name: My Medical
title: None
text: I do appreciate this must have app!  Two things I would add - appointments, or the ability to work with existing calendar and the option of including heart rate with BP.  Looking forward to updates!

name: My Medical
title: I like it!
text: I bought the app and added my medical info. It's great that I can use the web to fill in the form and then email to my iPhone. Great time saver. Multiple people records is also a great idea. Overall I like it very much. I'd suggest a couple of things. One, to be able to add jpegs (x-rays . . .),  forms, doctors portraits, etc. anything medical I take a picture of with my iPhone. Two, under "Illness & Injuries" it would be good to be able to have a FULL calendar for the "Onset" category. Right now I can only add the current year dates. I have chronic illnesses and would like to have the actual starting date recorded for them. Look forward to any updates!

name: My Medical
title: Love this app to the max!
text:
I travel across usa for work,o end up at a different Dr every time I travel. When  I go to dr. I forget so many things, this app worth it's money!!
What it could use is:  a place to keep a photoof both sides of your health INS. Card & notes so you can remeber what your next appt is for, and questions to ask when you see your dr.  That would just be a bonus to an A++ app that it already is!

name: My Medical
title: App
text: It it truly the best way to keep all the info, for all my patients also my mom and husband:)) ... Wish I had it sooner!

name: My Medical
title: Awesome App....just a minor problem
text:
I love this app. It has all the info that the EMS would need.  The only thing I've noticed so far that I would add is the ability to add your heart rate to the blood pressure test, so it can be graphed along with the blood pressure.

Also, since I keep this app on the home screen, I'd like to have an icon that will draw attention to it. EMS may not be looking for this app if they are trying to go through the phone looking for numbers to call.

Other than that, this is a must have app!!

name: My Medical
title: After inputting the data, VoiceOver cannot read the data!!!
text: The app could help millions manage their medical care -- EXCEPT fopr those who are blind!  The aapp is very thorough on information requested, but have omitted MILLIONS of blind, visually impaired AND hand-free users from utiliziing this vital information.  PLEASE< PLEASE, PLEASE make your site acccessible for ALL iPhone users -- sighted and unsighted!  Thank you!

name: My Medical
title: Great app. Important medical info all in one place.
text: I think this is a great app. Having the ability to maintain complete medical information in one place, especially when traveling, is invaluable.  Thanks!

name: My Medical
title: Great application
text: This app is worth every penny. The older I get the harder it is to remember things. This makes it so much easier by having all you med. Info at your fingertips. Thanks for such a great product!

name: My Medical
title: Fab App!
text:
Wonderful app and certainly more convenient than taking ziplock bags of meds to each dr appt! Email and txt views are also an added plus for sending to providers, and who could complain about the email backup option?  I've had the app for a few hours now and have finally finished filling everything in.  The photo ID for each patient prevents emergency workers from applying the wrong patient info to the wrong person, which is another plus.  Additionally, I'm glad the info isn't stored on servers anywhere (preserving strict privacy) and doesn't require wi-fi to access. 

A very minor bug I found:

- When "view information as text" or "send info by email" options are selected, emergency contacts' phone number is shown as "PrimaryTelForNumber" rather than the actual number. I would correct to show actual telephone numbers.

Great program, highly recommended! This is the best $2 I've spent thus far.

name: My Medical
title: Two thumbs up!
text: Absolutely love this app. Well worth the $$$. Would recommend this to everyone. Very easy to use. It would be great medical personnel and police knew to look for this info especially for people who do not wear a medical alert tag. No complaints whatsoever!

name: My Medical
title: Great App!!!!
text: This app is the best! I use all the time to keep track of my brain tumor, doctors, and meds that I take. My doctors are now recomending it to others. Well worth it.

name: My Medical
title: I use MyMedical
text: Love the App. Would like to see an appointment issue list maker to make brief notes about whatto talk to Docs. about because I usually go in with multiple issues, and always forget to bring something up. Also, I take 13 mess and a collapsed list would be easier to go thru when nurse reads off what she has from my last visit. But it truly is great having all my med info at my fingertips for me and my kids. Thanks. Keep up the great app!

name: My Medical
title: None
text: Wonderful app!!!  Great customer service with quick response time. Definitely worth more than what is being charged.

name: My Medical
title: This app. Is Awesome. Buy it NOW!!
text:
If you have an extensive medical history like myself...you will absolutely LOVE this. It compiles all medical data into a summary page to be read as text. It is very thorough and user friendly. Be prepared to spend some time entering all your data but it ays off in the end. 
Nice work to the creators!!

name: My Medical
title: Great app. With small changes
text:
I would like to see emergency info accessed without a password when you have a password enabled. Also in the lab test section, a few more tests like glucose in the menu that can be graphed. Very minor stuff but the app itself is very good. Worth the $$$$.
UPDATE ......new upgrade now is up!!  This Ap is all that you can want. The author of the Ap LISTENS. Would give it ten stars if I could.

name: My Medical
title: Thank You!
text: I like this app very much and thank you for your time and effort in writing it.  I would like to see the medication and prescription combined.  Seems like a dupe of previously entered info.

name: My Medical
title: Greatest Medical App!!!!
text: Thank you so much for developing this app!!!! I feel so much better having this on my iPhone with me at all times. So convient & so easy to use. I recommend this app for anyone!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Great app!
text: I love this app. I wish I had known about it sooner. I have a heart problem so I need to let my drs know of myedications, allergies and so forth. I tried to make my own but this is much better and I can read it as a text and even send it to e-mail. I can also print it and have it in my purse at all times.  So it's worth the small amount I paid.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This app is great for storing all your medical info.  I'd love it if the upgrade would allow you to upload pdf reports of procedures, lab work, etc..which you could view and email as well.

name: My Medical
title: Not able to import data
text: I purchased this application, because it reportedly had the capability of entering data on a website and then the ability to import the data entered through an email sent to my iPhone. I entered data and requested that an email be sent to 2 different email addresses. The first email address I tried to send it to didn't receive the email at all. The second one went into my spam folder (a day later), but when I tried following the directions to get the data imported, I was not able to. I sent an email to the developer asking for help, but never got a response. I am disappointed.

name: My Medical
title: The best medical app out there.
text:
Thanks for such a great app. I truly believe this could save someones life by having all the info available to the doctor at the right time. Would love to see a pain journal with calendar dates. Also how about pictures for the meds. And alerts for doctor appointments and medication reminders. 

Thank you,
Dan

name: My Medical
title: Very useful
text: I just finished seeing multiple Doctors , for multiple reasons. I wish I had had this app then. It takes some time to get it all down right , but once it's down it's down. I highly reccomend this app.

name: My Medical
title: Terrific program
text: I've used a number of medical history apps & this is the best. It's very well designed & works perfectly. It's a keeper.

name: My Medical
title: Love this app!
text: Wish I had thought of this! I've been wanting to organize my med info for years, but didn't want paper. This provides portability, convenience, and graphs lab results. Thnk you thank you

name: My Medical
title: My Medical App
text: This is an awesome app! It took me some time to set it up because it is so detailed. It is well worth the time it takes to enter the info.

name: My Medical
title: Great help
text: This program is a great help. I see many different Doctors due to health problems and this helps keep everything together. It also helps me keep all of the doctors informed about what test have been done and how they came out as well what meds I am on and why. It also lets me track the rest of the family as well. I know that in an emergency I will be able to pull up this information to help treat myself and my family. I think this app is worth the money. I love to see an update that allows you to also store information medical implant information as well.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: Easy and quick to use. Have tried several other medical record apps and this is the best by far.

name: My Medical
title: Worth every cent
text: Got this app after I had to call 911 for my boyfriend. It is a great app and I can tell that's it going to come in handy even at check ups. Super easy to use!!!

name: My Medical
title: OIF/OEF VETERAN
text: Great App. I am on multiple meds since my medical retirement from the military, I can never remember all of my meds due to my condition and I am, blessed my Angel (wife) found this one for me, ty again.

name: My Medical
title: Medical app review
text: Good application. Needs to make co-pay information larger since there's alot of copay information that need to be entered. Other than that it's a good app to have.  When your filling out Doctors questionaires this really comes in handy.

name: My Medical
title: A Great App
text: They thought of everything, even being able to email all of your info to yourself or others. I just have to remember to change the info if/when medical info changes. This app is well worth the small amount of money.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text:
Great app and very comprehensive. The only thing I would additionally ask for is that I use this app for my family, including 3 small kids, and it would be nice to have somewhere to store recent illnesses (much like you can record immunizations). Only kids get things often and repeatedly (like Strep) that it would be nice to have a record. 
Great app though!

name: My Medical
title: Fact: Tetanus shot every 10 yrs; Date of your last shot?
text:
Mine? 1999, and yes, I am like a year overdue. LOL
I might not have noticed had it not been part of MyMedical. 
It is the best and most used APP I have. As ratings go, I rarely give out 4 stars and I've never given 5 until now. 

• It is easy to use either on your device or on your PC. 
• When you have questions ASK. 
• When you have input, GIVE. 
• There is a real person at the other end who listens and responds. 
• The APP is continually improving and becoming more robust. 

Very impressive. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS APP TO THE FOLLOW PEOPLE:
1: Would like to track their own medical information (especially those like me who see 6 specialists a week and can't keep up with meds)
2: Anyone with achool age children. Keeping track of vaccinations, their last visit to the dentist, and eye doctor.  
3: Anyone who cares for an elderly person (parent, grandparent): keep their information handy; their doctors information, Medications RX #s, Pharmacy, dosage, schedule, last time it was filled, allergy alerts, insurance/Medicare info, etc. 
4: Anyone interested in collecting their Family Medical History. It's important to ask everyone now, more important to document it and MOST important to consistantly update and distribute.

name: My Medical
title: Incredibly Useful!
text: Very nicely done.  I highly recommend this useful app.

name: My Medical
title: Great PHR Application
text: I looked at every PHR app available for the iPhone, most of them more expensive than this one.  My Medical records everything I need and more.  I highly recommend this for anyone.

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic
text: This app is so great!  I've been trying to fully digitize my records for the past year but haven't found a format that I liked. The only thing I wish that it had is graphing of custom labs.  Definitely worth the $2!

name: My Medical
title: Nice basic app
text: Good for the basics but would like to see labs broken down into at least the more common ones done. Also a reminder system built in as to when you're due again for a lab or appt would be nice!

name: My Medical
title: Nice App But...
text:
You have got to fix it so that when entering data in various fields on your web site, the use of the enter key does not wipe out all data.  When I hit the return key all data I had entered for an hour was gone. Frustrating!!!!!!!!!

Secondly, why do I have to enter all data in this small frame on your site?  Can't you create a web site data entry portal that lets me use my big screen?  Annoying.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
If you need to keep track of medical information, DO NOT look any further ... buy this ap.  I stumbled upon it and am glad I did.  

The online information entry form worked flawlessy and, in a matter of minutes, the data I entered on the web site was emailed to me and uploaded to the program.  The only way this program could have been any easier to use is if someone else had done all my typing.  :-)  

I contacted the author Saturday evening with some questions, expecting to hear back Monday.  I heard back approximately 2 hours after I emailed him.  That kind of service is literally unheard of today.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This application works great and the updates they have keep making it more user friendly! I highly recommend it!!

name: My Medical
title: Buggy and could be more friendly
text: The app crashes a lot. I don't know why there isn't a checklist for family history items. Why type each thing in by hand? Could be much more simple to enter data. Needs work and TLC.

name: My Medical
title: Indispensable
text: I can't say how much I enjoy having this App. I always hate going to the hospital or doctors office and having to fill out forms without having all my information with me. This app gives me a place to keep all my info, and my wife's info and the kids info all in one place. I wanted to transfer my info to my other iphone and an itouch, but could not get it to work. I tried several times, but no luck. I sent Steven an email about my problem, and just a couple of hours later I had my answer. I had forgotten to sync my second iphone, so it still had the older version of My Medical. I updated it, and it worked perfect. Now I have all my info on both iphones and my itouch. Thanks Steven for great service, and a wonderful App.

name: My Medical
title: Nice App
text:
I like the app, but I would like to see enhanced graphics on the start-up page and also with options to show key info when the app is opened. Like emergency contacts, next Dr.s appt, Dr. phone number...etc. 

It is cool you can also enter all your info on the website and transfer it to your phone. What I don't like is the annoying calanders for dates that you must use. You can not just simply enter a date without scrolling through the years and months.

I would also like to graph my weight and blood pressure readings and be able to send them to my doctor. I have to use two other apps to do this. Would be nice if one app would handle all of this.

If you really want to go all out....add a push to notify the user of Dr. appts, pick up meds from the pharmacy, etc.

Overall, great app.

name: My Medical
title: Wish I could rate this better...
text: but I can't because I cannot do anything with it without it crashing. No entries, no getting info from contacts, no nothing.

name: My Medical
title: Textuftif
text:
Fabulous APP don't know how I handled all my med info w/o it.  Very handy when visiting a new doctor's office or going to a hospital for tests.  I can just look on my new Medical App and have the answers I need right on my IPod Touch.  Fantastic!  Too bad I can't give it 6 stars ..... Only thing missing from the lists is Vitamin/Mineral
Supplements, but I let Steven know.

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic!!!!!
text: I have tried a bunch of these looking to replace an app on my palm that kept track of so much data and none came close-but this one finally does!!!! Invaluable at a doctors office filling out forms!! Thank you!!!

name: My Medical
title: Crocodileemt
text: Awesome app!! Just spent the last 6 hours gathering and updating medical history. Invaluable app to own!! Highly recommend to all!! Best $ 0.99 I ever spent!!

name: My Medical
title: Superb App! My Most Used App!!!
text:
Does everything I need it to and more! Awesome version (v1.1) upgrade too.

Version 1.2 upgrade was very impressive! Steven added some features I had been asking for (backup ability, more date fields, current meds migration to past meds and more).  This app is worth more than it's price and a lifesaver when filling out forms at a new specialist's office. Several of my doctors actually use info I store in the app. The app: "Print Magic" is a nice tool for sharing your med info with doctors. And now that there is web site for data importing I'm sure the people that asked me about this app will migrate their info over as well. Keep up the good work Steven.

name: My Medical
title: Great app with much potential
text:
This is a great app for all the reasons stated by other reviewers: user interface, functionality, integration with email & address book. 

I love the lab results section, as I want to track lab values over time, but would really like to add more variables in addition to blood pressure and cholesterol (white blood cell, red blood cell, glucose, etc). Then those would be able to be graphed over time. It'd be even better to be able to add all values from a single lab report, rather than each value separately (having to select the date every time).

Those features would make this app perfect for me and earn 5 stars. :)

name: My Medical
title: PhylSGann
text: This an awesome app.  You can have all of your medical info at the touch of a finger for emergency workers to review.  This will save time when treating you, especially if there is not any family member with you.  I have shown the icon to all of my family so they can point it to medical personnel.  Thanks for doing this awesome and for free.  It could save your life!

name: My Medical
title: MD
text: A complete disappointment. Simply a word document with broad categories and no defined structure that would be acceptable ti any clinician.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: I really wish this app would share information between patients.  I'd like to keep records for my whole family.  I don't see an easy way to use the same contact info/primary care doc/emergency contact/etc for multiple people.  With a wife and 5 kids, it is tedious entering this for each person over and over again.  I wish the vaccination record would allow you to select one from a list.  With a bit of work I can see this being a 4 star app but I think it's a long way off from a 5 star app...

name: My Medical
title: Wonderfully useful and thorough
text: This app is very pertinent if you have any medical problems or take any meds on a regular basis. All your info that has to be filled out at any new Dr you see is all in 1 place. And you can email it all or read it as text, that was a great idea. Great app guys I find it very valuable.

name: My Medical
title: Very helpful
text:
I have a lot of medical problems. I'm always forgetting to bring a list of my medical info when I see a new Dr but with this app I can keep the info at easy access. Thanks for coming up with this helpful and important app for people like me. 
The only thing I can think of to make it better would be a place to put diabetic information.

name: My Medical
title: Nice, but please add vision
text: I likeed the App, but I wish it had a vision section. One could add their lens Rx info.

name: My Medical
title: Good App
text: It would be very usefull if it notifies when the prescription is close to refill time.

name: My Medical
title: Nice App!
text: Like the one stop storage. Glitch in the emergency contact editor. Tried to import info from contacts but app threw me out and closed. Had to manually enter info. Wish it had a blood pressure and blood glucose tracker also.

name: My Medical
title: Great app for medical info
text: Handy app for storing medical info. Great that it can hold info for entire family. Please add section for storing vitamin and herbal supplements. Also please add mammography for scheduled tests.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: Great program has everything I need!

name: My Medical
title: How about adding mammogram
text: Does the job. But how about adding mammogram as one of the scan types?

name: My Medical
title: Top Notch
text: This very useful application works well because it simply keeps track of essential medical data in a very easy-to-use format. It is organized logically, it is simple to add or look up data, and it is adaptable. The developer responds quickly and personally  to suggestions, and I believe improved versions will add the capability to graph various lab or personal data, making it helpful to observe trends in one's healthcare. I have no complaints.

name: My Medical
title: Love it
text:
Love the app for keeping track of your parents and your kids. 
Only one suggestion,  wish you could add what doctor put patient on the medication & what it is supposed to be for.  Hopefully. They will keep improving.

name: My Medical
title: Great Tool!
text: I'm changing doctors and this was a GREAT way for me to get all my info together. I take care of my Mom, so I'll be adding her info, too. Love that I can email info if needed.

name: My Medical
title: Not Recommended
text: Not intuitive, cannot review quickly, too many taps to get things done

name: My Medical
title: Very Comprehensive
text: I started using the app today.  It is very thorough and easy to use. It is laid out in a logical fashion and allows for entering a complete medical history or as little as you need.  There are a few minor bugs that are inconvenient but don't impair the program.  I have contacted the app's author.  Since this is a new app, I expect the bugs to be fixed soon.

name: My Medical
title: App user
text: I am 68 with a thick medical folder. This program is perfect in keeping all your information at your fingertips. Very user friendly with great responsive support.  At .99 cents this is a steal!!  Buy it, you won't regret it.

name: My Medical
title: Rancher
text: Not worth a buck. Unstable

name: My Medical
title: This is everything!
text:
I have watched for something like this app. Found it and boy it is thorough. I have everything I need for entire family from appt.s and allergies to medications present and past with doses and side effects. I have emailed my information to my parents and to a physician and really like the clean simple to read data that it produces. 

Top notch app, stop look any further this is it!!

name: My Medical
title: Great tool!
text: I highly recommend it! Reliable -- I can store my critical information in one place. I see many Doctors & adding them took only minutes since they are in my Contacts; I simply dowloaded their data into the APP.  I can store meds; Drug Name, Dosage, Frequency & Side Effects -- which I can quickly email to my Doc. or access easily to update a hard copy.  It has a place to track Office Visits, from the Date to the Outcome (great for notes & follow-up), -- I think the author has covered it all.  I can email data from within any of the sections directly to my Physician if I need to.  Nice, neat, clean, and very easy to use -- no useless data that is not relevant.  Exactly what I was looking for!

name: My Medical
title: Excellent program
text:
I have been searching for a very long time for a way to keep track of my personal medical information.  I have downloaded several others but they all failed to meet my expectations in one way or other.  This program has many features that I love such as ability to import info from your contact list, email,  and ability to have info on more than one person.  

I would like to see a way to track procedures/tests, when they were done and when they are due again.  Also suggested a dental catagory.  Would love to see customizable catagories with sub-catagories, for example: "Phsyical Exam", with all the dates for the exam not mixed up with dates from other entries.   

I emailed the developer on a few suggestions for an update and I received a response back in just a few hours.  Already working on updates from the suggestions received.  

Much potential!

name: My Medical
title: Excellent Progam!
text: Great value for a terrific program! Great features such as password protection, local storage on IPhone, medical info for multiple people and ability to email info in a thorough printout with good logical progression. The App is very user friendly and imports contact info for physicians and emergency contacts directly from your my contacts. I emailed suggestions to the author about possibly adding lab and test result findings as wel as previous injuries and hospitalizations. I recieved a very rapid response back from the author of the App within a few hours. I look forward to updates and future Apps by this author. Thanks for a job well done!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Can't Access My New Account!
text: I just created an account but when I tried to sign in it wouldn't let me.  Just like another reviewer I even hit "forgot password" even though I didn't.  The site said it would send me an email immediately but lo and behold, NO EMAIL!  Now, I've waited five minutes, gone back to my email and found two new ones; one from Nordstrom and the other from The Outlet.  I will not be using this app so will go ahead and delete it.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Easy Format
text: I have had quite a few medical procedures nice 10 years. Over and over I have had to complete doctors with my medical history. This new application everything I had done and I can just print out and hand it to my doctors.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: History I
text: Excellent, safe place to keep medical records and very convenient to have them at hand and ready instead of digging through files.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Great app
text: This is the best app out there for keeping track of your medical records.  I use it for my family but also for my elderly parent.  I recently found out that it will sync with my PC and iPhone.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Very useful
text: Everything seems to work great. Looks like a great update!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Excellent App!
text:
I have quite a few meds to keep track of and I love that I simply push a button to fax my refill for each medication to my pharmacy! There is a visual tracker and I feel like I am more up to date with my meds than I ever was without this app.
I take it with me to all my doctor appointments when I need to go through all my medications.  It has been helpful to me in so many ways!

Also there doesn't seem to be a way to format the family history info. I try to make a new line for different info like each condition but after i save it and go to another page then come back everything is once again on one line which makes it very difficult to read. Please fix.

In addition, the developers are working to make it better using consumer comments and suggestions.  I highly recommend it for anyone who has more than themselves to keep up with.

I set up a file for my daughter as well. She was always calling me with questions; not any more. Thanks HealthSpek.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Michael Reardon MD
text:
I was so pleased to find this medical app today. I love the layout, ease of use and attention to detail. It reminds me of google health which was discontinued. This app is in many ways better than google health which I felt was the best available a few years ago.
      If you use this app then please give them your input. These guys are into CQI (continuous quality improvement) and they always want to make it better.
        I love the way you can email your entire record. I can see this app allowing download of lab results etc in the future.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: I love this app
text: It is made it so much easier to keep track of my medical history and share with my family. Keep up the good work

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Healthspek Aug2013
text:
I've always wanted to keep my own medical information in one place and have easy access whenever I need it.  Presto!  Healthspek came along with the answer.  While keying in relevant stats one becomes more aware of the necessity to know all meds, the dosages, the duration of and why they're taken; to be aware of all medical procedures, and their dates and also know ones family members medical history.  Healthspek is on the money.  This app takes into account all the questions a person is likely to be asked at a health care facility.  Features of conversion of info into a .pdf file are brilliant, as is the assignment of an I.D. that a physician can be given and have instant access to review information.  One biggie, the App is VERY user-friendly.
Persons living outside the USA may use this with ease.  I love it.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Most complete available!
text:
I have been looking for a long time for something to track health information for my family. My wife has so many issues, medications, allergies, etc., I have lost track. I resorted to Word documents which still wasn't ideal. 

Not only is this app well designed for tracking family health information, the companion iPhone viewer app will come in handy the next time we visit an ER. 

Give it a try today. You will be very pleased!

Whether its a visit to the emergency room or to a new allergy doctor you can be assured that they will have your most up to date healthcare record. Love it!  And I love that I can request refills from Walgreens!  Nice that I can add my husbands info and link to mine.

I have suggested that they add the ability to add lab reports. It is coming they said. Everyone with an iPad should use this app and it will be available on the iPhone.

title: Still useless
text: Supposedly they fixed login issues with last update, but I still cannot log in — username “not on file,” though it is. No useful support, no answer to emails.Worthless.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Used to work but now worthless clutter
text: I used to love this app and found it very useful since all of my doctors and hospitals used different portals and this made it so easy to just log into one for appointments, notes and results.  Now, all of a sudden, it can’t pull anything forward from half of my portals and I’ve confirmed they have data sitting there with the same login info and no new layers of encryption.  The other half have things being pulled forward with vague info like medical appointment on such and such date at such and such time, with the main address for the facility, but no provider name to give me any clue as to who I am supposed to see or if I am supposed to be at the main location or a satellite office.  I have looked to the developers website to report these issues but find NO place to reach customer support unless you are a business affiliate.  Really poor customer service standard.  Things didn’t always work like this because I can remember specifically reporting portal issues to them in the past and receiving excellent customer service and attention to help address and correct those issues at that time within hours at that time.  I don’t know what changed or why, but shame it did because they have truly hobbled this app and made it impossible to try to get help fixing things without having to resort to leaving bad reviews in the hopes they will read and respond so you can get help and later revise the review.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: I have only one complaint
text: I love this app and being able to keep all my health information easily accessible.  However, since it is my medical information, I don't understand why my doctor has to remove anything from my record on here in order for it to be correct? If anyone knows my medical information, it is me.  And I should be able to update it on my own.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Do NOT Download
text:
Do NOT Download this app. It is not ready for patients.

There is no way any practice using this App with Greenway EMR should be meeting Meaningful Use requirements from the government.

As a patient I have several portal apps and this is by far the worst.  I have now deleted the app for fear it does more harm than good PLUS the app is so non-functional that the staff suggest I need to log in with a full computer if I want to message my doctor.

As an EMR Professional I am scared for any providers office that uses this technology.   It DOES NOT meet Meaningful Use and the government needs to be made aware.

How anyone could write a great review WITHOUT submitting their name is ridiculous. All the positive reviews have to have been made by employees.

John G Amero

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Awesome app!
text: To be fair, I haven't used it too much yet, but I've used it enough to know it's very good. A couple things stood out so far. It keeps you signed in, which I love, yes you can sign out, but I'm lazy and I enjoy opening the app and getting right to work. I can't speak about the benefits for casual users, but for someone like me who is very involved with his health, this app is fantastic, very easy to check your labs/appointments, medications, and probably more that I haven't got into yet.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Saves Lives
text:
Medfusion Plus is a life saver. A very concise and easily accessible application. Plus   displays all our medical information similar to our doctors records. Along with displaying doctor appointments from multiple physicians. I was able to speak to the support team and found them to humble and hungry to make our lives better through keeping us and our individual medical teams on the same page. 

In worst case scenarios, I now feeling confident knowing that I have all my medical information in the palm of my hand.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Finally an App that does it all!!
text:
After using Medfusion Plus a couple of weeks, I happy to see it does everything you're looking for in a app...and it's all in one place!

All my providers? Check!
Family members' provider/info? Check!
Lab results? Check!
Appointment history? Check!
Communicates with Health Kit? Check!

Looking forward to what the future holds for Plus!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Some things should never change...
text: I never leave reviews and normally never have a problem but the entire process getting this app to work was horrible. To make a long story short...it never worked for me and customer support was horrid. All I received was a wasted 20 call I made to support with fake resolutions to get me off the phone and emails from them saying my case must be resolved cause I haven't called back. Even after I emailed them back to say it wasn't! Not even bothering with this app. I'll just deal with my Drs as I have in the past.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Years of numbers all right there
text: Incredibly useful for keeping track of all those lab results over time. The app went back and found all my old bloodwork labs so several years worth of info is now right at my fingertips. Very cool.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Very easy to use
text: I was able to easily log into several of my portal accounts and Medfusion Plus magically pulled in all my health and appointment data.  Will come in handy next time I have to see a specialist.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Powerful App
text:
The ability to use Medfusion Plus to monitor relatives and family members (as well as your own health) in all aspects of their medical care is one of the best features of the app. In one place you can see appointments, medications, review test results etc. Multiple family members and accounts can be added making this a powerful “one stop shop” to actively take part and monitor patient care of those you care about the most. The ability to communicate securely via multiple patient portals also makes this the only app you need in regard to medical monitoring.  

Powerful beginning to a revolutionary idea.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Medfusion Plus
text: This is a great app that allows you to get your multiple "medical portals" in one location. Easy to create your accounts/link your family's accounts. This app allows you to have access to your medical information, medications & appointments. Great to have this information when traveling too!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Great Tool!
text: What a wonderful app and invaluable tool for managing my health, as well as that of my special needs aunt!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Healthcare data right where I want it!
text: I used to keep track of all my healthcare data using an Excel spreadsheet - yeah, it was a real drag. I could never stay on top of keeping it updated with all my immunizations and lab report findings. With Medfusion Plus, all I have to do is whip out my phone, open the app, and it's all right there in front of me so I can kiss my spreadsheet goodbye! *Plus* the app keeps track of all my upcoming appointments so I won't forget. So handy!!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: One place for all my health data
text:
Loved it when years of lab result history loaded and I could see trends I haven't had the data to previously see 

Easy to use and definitely start to see the potential for more that can be done with sensor and other data

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Finally!
text: An app that truly helps a family consolidate and manage the delivery of care across their entire network of care givers.  I now have a way to check all past and future appointments, as well as previous and current medications, lab results, immunization and allergies for my entire family.  The initial setup takes a few minutes as you need to register each patient portal for your family.  But once registered, the information is automatically gathered and presented each time the app is opened.  So far so good.

name: higi
title: Add Apple health app
text: It would be great if PB would sync to Apple health app.

name: higi
title: Horrible!
text: I registered in at Publix Pharmacy.  I got the impression that it would pair with the iPhone app.  I keep receiving a message that I have not entered correct info on the app sign-in.  I have triple checked it.  I DO NOT HAVE WiFi!

name: higi
title: Should make it possible to earn watts towards instant rewards and not just for sweepstakes.
text: I just want to say that you guys should make it possible to save up earned watts and not just put them towards sweepstakes. You should make it possible to spend earned watts for instant rewards, say 20,000 watts for a $20 Gift Card (Amazon, Walmart, Target). If you do that, i will give this app two more stars, giving it a total of five. Thank you for listening.

Then I tried using my email and forgot my password but it did not allow me to do that either. I deleted it which is unfortunate so I lock my blood pressure on my phone and then transfer it to a spreadsheet.

name: higi
title: STORE UPDATE NEEDED, OUTLOOK.COM, IMO, THEN A 5 RATING
text:
Hi, For me, everything works great with HIGI. Both at the stores & the App. One suggested improvement, at the store machines, when you are logging in and you hit the @ sign, to give you all the email .com address. It lists most of the BIGGER ONES LIKE GMAIL & SMALLER ONES LIKE VERIZON & COMCAST.....BUT IT DOESNT GIVE YOU OUTLOOK.COM, WHICH IS MY EMAIL & HAS TO BE USED MORE THAN SOME ALREADY LISTED.

PS. One other suggested change, when you are finishing at the machine, the results pop up after ONE SECOND and says something about it ending right away. IMO, Either either change that 5 second country down to at least 10 or 15 seconds, to give you some time, to read the screen and not be rushed with that 5 second countdown... THANKS, MUCH APPRECIATED...
