I LOVE that I can email my doctors, refill prescriptions, make appointments, and manage my health history all without making a phone call!  This aspect of care makes managing my health personal and convenient. 
Thanks Kaiser!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't send MESSAGES!!!
text:
This app is 70% very useful and the 30% gives me a hard time. I use the app to communicate with my and my sons doctors but most of the time once I have written the message and press send it'll tell me that the message failed so I press resend and it still fails thus I just lost the message I wrote. So frustrating!!!! Makes me go crazy especially when it's something important!!! Please fix this major issue ASAP!!!
Sincerely,
Irritated Mommy ğŸ˜¡

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Seems to be Ok but needs to be informative
text: The app seems to be good. Quite helpful. I would give it a 5 star if it also shows little info regarding tests/vaccines. What is it? What if my value is lower or higher than defined range. That would make this app informative too. And also please do mention due dates of vaccines not taken.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Mobile records, email doc, get meds
text: This is a great app. Email your doctor or refill a prescription on the go.  I wanted to tell my friend what my cholesterol level was and I could find it right on my phone.  I can even refill prescriptions for my parents.  Great job Kaiser.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't figure out how to act for a family member with the new upgrade!
text: I love the app, however, since the new upgrade, I can't "act for a family member"any longer with is a HUGE inconvenience, and  really makes the usefulness of the app decrease. I loved being able to manage mine and my family's healthcare with the app and no longer can do this. Really disappointing!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Warning!!
text: Kaiser App desperately needs to post the amount of time you have to email your doctor.  After you've spent valuable time writing and submitting your email, you're told you've "timed out" and your content is lost.  It would be easy for Kaiser App to state the amount of time you have to compose/send your email on their copious "Email your doctor" pages.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Scheduling appointments
text: Being able to schedule appointments is the best feature but you should also be given the option to schedule with any available doctor if your primary doctor is unavailable. It would save a lot of time instead of then having to call in and speak with a receptionist

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good but missed one feature
text: This is a very good app that is intuitive and allows you to email your doctor, schedule or cancel appointments, refill prescriptions and see lab results.  Why it loses one star is because when you use Facility Locator the Department and Specialties numbers display but cannot be tapped on to dial.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Same useless crashing update?!
text: As noted by all the other reviews as of now, the update with enhancements added crashes the app immediately upon launching the app. This evening you guys released the same exact up date again but when I go to download it again it tell me that it's no longer available no matter what I do to take it off. Really? Not only is your app unusable but event the update you guys released an update that's literally useless? Get it together Kaiser!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: I hate updates
text: I'm stuck with a Gen 1 iPad and don't have the money at this time to buy a new one. This app is just one in a number of apps I have had to delete in the last few months because the iOS people and the app creators don't feel the need to support the older devices. I over paid to buy this iPad just like others over paid to get newer iPads. I wonder how long it will be before I have a large paper weight that originally cost over $400.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App!
text: This is a great application.  I can order my medications online, schedule or cancel an Appointment, view my medical record all from my iPhone.  I love it because I'm always on the go.  Just a few clicks and my meds are mailed ordered and delivered right at house.  This application is awesome!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Messages crashes constantly
text: Just got this new update last week, and the messages will not load. App keeps crashing. I hard reset my phone, uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Nothing works. Maybe it's iOS 9? Either way, I can't do anything as soon as I click messages, it dumps the app to the home screen. 7 times in a row. And I've been trying for over a week.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Email kinks
text:
For the most part, its an ok app. Quick access to test results & receive email from doctors. 

However, has lots of email problems: email replies failing (all the time) or not being able to reply to each message. not having access to a draft email if it doesnt send, logs you out went you refresh. 

As for appointments, too bad you cant make changes via app....maybe something to look into for future.
However, great to be able to see your appointments, including your proxy (ie my childs) schedule too. Plus it automatically has all your kaiser doctors/nurses prelisted in email section
Still worth downloading.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great except has issues
text: Generally I like this app. Good appt. info, my records, good interface etc. however it times out when I try to email my doctor. I think it would take anyone more than a minute or two to write an email to their doctor. Please update to show amount of time left til timeout or extend the timeout period for the app in the email writing part!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Feature Improvement
text: I would love to see a feature on this app, that could utilize the camera on the smartphone. For instance, you could take a picture of that rash or such and email it to your doctor to see if a condition worsens and what he or she may recommend be the next best thing to do.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Isn't allowing appointments
text: I've tried over the last six months to schedule an appointment numerous times. It just won't let me or even access the pharmacy. This is being extremely annoying I used to love this app but as of this year I don't use because of these difficulties. Also we should be able to schedule an appointment with the counseling department also from the app maybe for the next update the would life easier !

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: I hate everything about this company
text: It's 11:37 pm and I've been trying to schedule an appointment for 45 minutes to have my finger checked because it's leaking puss and this dumb app won't even help me schedule anything!!! Before this my home address that was sent by my workplace to Kaiser was wrong, and I couldn't even log on. I had to call in, wait like a week for a letter containing my password, and now this dumb app doesn't even let me schedule anything! Should have chosen Blue Cross.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Overall good
text:
Easy to use. I've had very little problems & most fix with swiping the app off & going back to it. 
I would like to be able to send my doctor files like  I can on the website. 
I like the ease of having everything at my fingertips.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Nice but...
text: I constantly have to reset the theme. It doesn't display that I have a new message. It is nice to be able to contact dr and refill anything that I need. But sometimes it glitches. Have wrote to kaiser about it and they haven't done anything about it. It's great, but if you have a problem you are on your own. They won't help you with the app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: At my finger tips
text: In addition to the easy refill button I would also like to be able to help keep my medical record accurate by telling my doctor which medications I am currently still taking

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very nice UI. Password is a pain.
text: Beautifully designed and user friendly interface. More friendly than website. But the password re-entering issue is a major pain in the rear. My password is long and complex for security. I cannot remember. Now I need to change it to something simple I can remember - easy to defeat! What's the point?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't reply to messages.
text: I love this app, but I HATE that every time I have to respond to my doctor is by making a whole new conversation. The little arrow at the bottom on the right is a tease. Other than that I love this app. I love how I can do everything and see my lab results all from my phone!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works, but needs improvement
text:
Downloaded, logged on with no problem, however some features come up a bit slow.  

Would like to see improvements in interface and efficiency.  Keep working at it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Email doc needs to attach pictures
text: App is in general pretty functional except you can't attach a photo from your phone when you use the app to email your doctor. It seems pretty obvious to me half the point of a health care app on a phone is to be able to send pictures to your provider conveniently.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: It's ok
text: I like that I can send my doctor emails and receive test results through my phone. What I don't like is that I can't make appointments on the app after a certain time, usually after midnight when I get home from work.  Maybe the system does maintenance at a certain time? Whatever the reason, it's annoying.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Survivor
text:
I'm a Cancer free patient with MANY appointments, lab test, etc. I'm still currently getting treatment. This app has been wonderful for me. Med refills, scheduling appointments, seeing my lab results quick. And communicating with ALL my care team in one app has helped ease my anxiety. 

Thank you KP!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App and easy to use
text: This is great Kaiser app. Easy to use and no technical problem. Few fingers tips away and I'm done making appointments, checking lab results and more. If you are a kaiser patient, you should have this!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love this new version!
text: I love being able to choose who I view information for by just touching a name. Now I can quickly see my information or the info for my kids in one-touch. Great re-design!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Cannot see past visit information for family member
text: This app is ok in terms of seeing your own health information. However it's not so user friendly when you need to do something for your family member, for example my 6 month baby. I want to see the weight and height measurement but I can't.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good and simple. One flaw.
text: I like this app and I'm grateful that Kaiser has created it. There is one big flaw with this app and that is that if you're trying to email your doctor and you get a phone call it will log you out and erase everything that you just typed.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: No card icon
text: Today I received a Kaiser mailing telling me that I can obtain a digital card if I download the app and sign in. Well, I did that on my phone and my wife's phone and, try as I might, I cannot locate a "card icon" on the app. I've searched everywhere on the sappy, on both phones and still I can't find the card icon. I hope that I'm the problem and it isn't the app. I'll check back for more feedback from other users.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Constant Crashing
text: Updated to iOS 9 on my IPhone 6 and KP suddenly crashes constantly. I have 3 messages in my inbox which are important, but I cannot access them. Since my doctors are accustomed to communicating with me through this app, I don't have any other form of message, and don't even know which one to call.  I may perish before KP app updates me, so I'm writing my will, just in case. Thanks KP. I'm leaving you my impressive collection of empty rX bottles.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Excellent app
text: I need to check the address of my dermatology doctor and find it very easy in this app, today is my appointment and really do it easy for me, highly recommended to download the app! Very great-full with this tool!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't email kids' doctor?
text: Great app for my use, but unfortunately despite being able to choose to view information for my daughter , it always redirects back to my view. Therefore, I cannot email my daughter's doctor, which would be helpful. (She is an infant and does not have her own account)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Exceptional App
text: Wonderful to be able to carry everything with me...my prescriptions, appointments, e-mails to/from my doctor, etc.  I would like to see Optical Prescription included at some point. Thanks for continuing to make KP ever better!!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app, much improved after the redesign
text: This is a relatively full featured, attractively designed app. I wish that I could write a custom reason when scheduling an appointment, but otherwise I have nothing but good things to say.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: New upgrade has bugs with App
text:
When you open the app it lets you get to the main dashboard but the minute you try & open things like pharmacy or your messages it closes the app. I tried to restart my phone & log back back in but I'm still having issues. ðŸ˜ž 
Please fix these bugs, when you do I'll rewrite my rating. Thank you

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Basic app with helpful access
text: As of November 21, 2014 this app is not optimized for iOS8 on an iPad so it looks pretty bad. It does let you access your medical info, send messages to your provider, and schedule appointments so it's useful. I hope it gets updated soon, though.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Use To Be Fantastic
text: Got a little better after the update. Thank you! However the app is like off center. It's protrudes up into the top status bar where it shows my time/battery/signal strength so options are like up there. So the format needs to be fixed because it looks weird.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Fabulous
text: What I've been waiting for. This is a supper convenient way to reach my doctor, see labs and refill prescriptions. I'm also able to take care of my elderly mom and manage all of her needs.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Not the best
text: It's not great at telling me where my appointment is approximately 10 minutes before. It just disappears. And then I'm stuck at NorCal region. Hah. People move, you know? I can't get to SoCal region on the app and make an appointment with a doctor. So the app has now become all the more useless for me. Bummer. Wanna do something about changing location of where I can make an appt? It's taunting me. I can see locations but its useless because I can't make appointments anyway.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App
text: I have kids. I use this app all the time. Well made, has all the information I need. Great job kp! Love that I can look up everything on me and the kids easily and quickly. Worth every bit of 5 stars.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works great!
text: I don’t know why people are having problems with this fab app on their iPhone 6t. It is working as expected for me. (Delete the app and download from iTunes again if all else fails.)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Worked Great
text: It seems they've worked out the kinks other reviewers have mentioned.  I was able to access all the features.   Very handy app to have on hand.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: No response
text: I've written before and no response. Making an appointment is difficult always kicks me out system. Also I don't see where to add my children's medical record number to view their information as we'll. only let's you log in one persons medical record number

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Polished interface
text: And instant access to everything you could want, including member services, and the appointments line. It's perfectly functional and it looks great. Well done.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love the upgrades
text: I can see all my family's messages in one inbox without switching profiles. So much easier and smoother for me as a parent. Love the upgrades and new look.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Just one more thing!!!!!!!
text:
With more of us doing so many things from our iPad's today it would be so nice if there were a version of this app for it. So please please give us an iPad version. Did I say Please!!!!

At that point I could and would gives it five stars

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser Permanente app
text:
Useless - cant even start the app succesfully. Upon startup you get "bad response received from server" error. The only button available is "OK", and when you click it, you get the same "bad response received from server" message, ad infinitum. 

Tried to access App Support button from the iTunes store for the app...and guess what... That too gave some server configuration error.

I hope the medical card is more robust than the app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Almost there
text: App is great for some things, but not others. For instance, cannot complete prescription refill process, due to credit card processing stalling out. Please address this issue. It would also be nice to have the video conferencing feature with your physician, like they already have in NoCal.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Crashes
text: Worked before on my iPhone 5. Now it will stretch the logo and crash right after. EDIT: reinstalled and it seems to be working again. It's convenient but it's annoying to have to uninstall and reinstall.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to Use!
text: I love this app, and because it's so easy to navigate I decided to leave a review. In less than a minute I can have my prescription order placed, and know it's going to be sent to me on time. Great app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Useful!
text: Very useful app. There might be this option and I just haven't found it, but the only other thing I would like are reminder notification that advise me when I have an appointment coming up. Other than that, I like this!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Use iPhone to make appointments
text: We do have a feature request: from within the iPhone we need the ability to make appointments. There are many reasons for that function to be added.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A bit quirky
text: It's nice to have a mobile app but it is still easier to use the web portal than this app.  When you try to select the addressee of your email, the intended recipient must be highlighted, and then you  press "done", and then the name appears in the address box.  Quite counter- intuitive.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app is better than the site!
text: Probably the first app that I am impressed with that actually works better than the actual site. Making appointments is super easy. I love it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Amazing!
text: I can easily send and receive msgs from my docs, book appointments, and even refill prescriptions! And it hasn't crashed yet! This is Not a kaiser employee post--I just really enjoy having a hospital app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great to view info but not for transactions
text: It's great I am able to view my medical record. However, when I ordered a refill on my prescription, I never received it. I know I checked out correctly and even received a confirmationessage that it has been ordered. Next time I will just call or go on their web site, instead of the mobile app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good start
text: This app is quite useful. For much easier use, though, I'd love to have the option to stay logged in so I wouldn't need to enter a user ID and password every time I want to access it. At a minimum, please add the capability for the app to store the user ID. (Many other secure app, such as those for banks, allow this.)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it, perfect for on the go
text: I love this app, it gives me access to my medical records no matter where I'm at and I can either book an appointment or email my doctor or view my labs all from my phone! Love it, thank you kp :)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App's inbox doesn't function properly.
text:
I am unable to read any message in my inbox. It retrieves and lists the header info only - showing who sent the email and what date/time it was sent.

Also, lab results and emails should have an option to view unread items only. Kaiser, you need some developers that care about making the app WORK.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app is the best!
text: So happy kaiser finally has a mobile app! I have been waiting for this for a while. I love that I can email my doctor from wherever I am. I would highly recommend this to my friends. Awesome app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Must have!!
text: Seamless easy to navigate app. Can fill meds on the go and make appointments too. I love that I can read and send messages to my doctors too and find lab results. Kp continues to be the best healthcare I have ever had.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Setting up appointments NEEDS fix
text:
Setting up appointments on the app can be tricky and frustrating. 

If you press "done" on the top right corner, you're screwed. You will have to do the whole process over again. Instead, you must scroll down and press "continue."
I'm 23 years old and very fond of technology, yet the misleading "done" on the top right corner still gets me every time. So I'm sure it's affecting the older folk. 

Also, it asks for your ideal date of appointment TWICE. The first time you have to type out the date in mm/dd/year format. Then, it doesn't take into account this date you inputed when you have to select the date the second time. So annoying. 

Come on, Kaiser.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome!
text: Couldn't believe I could order a prescription right from the app, and test results are way easier to read vs the mobile browser. Great app all around!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Freezes frequently. Too slow
text: Very disappointing. Seems to me to be simple bug fixes and this should happen sooner rather than later. Has the potential to be a great app but freezing all of the time and having to close the app and reopen to a black a screen, is not efficiency at its best. I'd rather log on to the full website.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser finally did something right >.<
text: HATE going to kaiser because I usually go in an hour before my appointment and end up waiting at least 2 hours PAST my appointment time. EVERY TIME! But this app is cool. Thanks!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Doesn't work well for moms
text: I was- and still am- really excited to utilize this app, but while it has options to view my children's messages and schedule appointments for them, those options default to MY account and information. Frustrating, because I almost never make apts for myself. Nice potential with some fixes.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can you add a print function?
text:
I like the app for booking appointments and checking results but today I found myself wanting to print an email from my doctor. Can you guys add that function in the next update?
Thanks

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Almost perfect
text:
The only feature I would love to see would be a simple refill button next to the list of precriptions currently prescribed.

Otherwise perfect!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Simple, better than the web site. But maps lock up
text:
ID card in app? - They brag up front in the description, then scroll down to where they bury the "only available in" note. 

The Good - it's simple. 

The Bad - maps are slow to load data (compared to maps app anyway). It locks up the app when you change zoom or change filter.  It seems to chew up the battery life quickly (35% to 15%) in only a few minutes. 

The Very bad - no way to track a mail order prescription. I was in the dark once you click send.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome healthcare app
text: Love this app!  Being able to send secure messages to my doctor, refill a prescription, schedule an appointment, and see my test results all from my phone is the most cool thing EVER!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: It's ok
text: I am not sure why I am not given the option to reply on some messages to my doctor and not on others... Also, the scroll selection when writing a message is very difficult to use... Selecting my doctor, reasons, etc... Is very difficult to actually select and move on to the next area.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Terrible App
text: I was able to write and 'send' a message to my doctor, after I few days I checked on my laptop to see why my doctor had not responded and the message was gone. I also cannot see future appointments.  For days I've been receiving an error message when I try to view my appointments. At least I can refill prescriptions and set up mail order delivery.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't book appointments
text:
The most useful part of this app never works for me. Booking an appointment requires a preferred date, however no matter what date I choose there is no available time (unless I call, and then there is no problem!)
It should at least have "next available dates" as an option...

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App is a must have
text: If you have kaiser then you know what a pain their health system can be to navigate. Once you have this app it becomes a breeze. No more hold times or frustrating conversations with powerless call room attendants. GET THIS APP or pony up more cash for a PPO.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Just reload
text: If the app crashes, try deleting it then reloading it from the App Store.  Worked for me.  This app works nicely, way better than it used to.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Finally...
text: I love this App, I was waiting for it to be released. It is so easy to use and love the fact that you are able to do pretty much what you do on the computer.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Where is the insurance card?
text: This app is fine as far as getting messages from Kaiser but what I wanted was to keep my insurance card on my phone and I don't see a way to do this. It looked like there was a button at the bottom but that does not appear on my version and I can't find a way to add it. Will be deleting.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Map feature is very slow!
text: When I tried to look up kaiser location, it was very very slow. Got stuck many times and no success so far. Other than the location function, other features are nice.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Not so bad
text: The app is helpful and makes scheduling appointments and filling prescriptions easy but there should be an alert option for when your prescription needs to be refilled, being away in school I have to get it mailed to me and I need to know when I can do it ASAP.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Cannot delete messages
text: I keep getting errors when I try to delete read messages. I've tried closing app & restarting - nothing works. I do like that I can all of my family's messages in one screen- very helpful compared to full site.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Useful-has bugs. Great without the bugs.
text:
Lets you see quite a bit of info. Very helpful. 

Doesn't let you schedule appointments. Errors out saying you can't do the select action (paraphrasing). On the future visits that is. Didn't bother with the same day appointments.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Copy + Paste
text: This app is great for getting all the information I need about Heath status. However it would be nice to be able to copy information so I can copy an address and paste it in google maps, or copy a test result name so I can look it up in google to know what it means.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Incredible
text: What an advance in medical technology.  To have my medical record available on demand like this and the ability to access the vast resources at KP is outstanding. Keep up the ground breaking work!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Messages won't open?!
text: I've been using app for awhile now but ever since last Apple update, I can't open messenger! It just crashes on me. Please fix this ASAP! I really rely on this app to take care of my medical needs. Once you get that fixed I'll move it to 5 stars!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to use and convenient
text: This app is pretty basic and useful as an on the go basis. Booking appointments is very convenient as well as sending messages.  The UX is easy to navigate. Haven't utilized the pharmacy section yet, but so far so good.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app
text: Works perfect with my iPhone 5 with iOS 8.02. I like it better then their website. Everything from communication with my doctor to refilling my prescriptions.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't log-on / No response from tech support
text: I've sent several bug reports to Kaiser's Technical Support email and after *one month* I received a reply back stating they would like to review log files while I attempted to sign in to the app.  I replied to the email, but never heard back again. How can Kaiser support an application when they reply to emails after a month or not at all?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Wish it would save password/login
text: Pretty good overall, but I wish it would let me stay logged in if I have a secure password on my device. It's a real pain to have to provide my password each time, especially if I use a long, secure password.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Patient
text: LOVE this app. Was able to view info, correspond with my physician, make appointments all from my phone on the fly. Access to all family's information.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Constantly crashing
text: I don't even use the app anymore. I just deleted it tonight because it constantly crashes, freezes, or says it can't perform the action I'm asking for. If they make some upgrades and smooth out the performance, I'd use it again. For now, the mobile site works better.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: good promise, poor execution
text: This app is very slow and even on a wifi network I get a lot of requests can't be processed messages and then get kicked several layers up in the menu hierarchy. While not fantastic itself, their website is better.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love this app
text: I really love the convenience of this app. I do wish other items such as referrals were included. A copy posted would save time money and paper.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: HUGE improvement!
text: Much better than past apps. Super easy to book appointments, refill prescriptions, etc.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App!
text: It has everything I need to manage my entire family's medical records! It makes it so easy to keep track of everything regarding our health!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Full functionality of the app...not there yet!
text: I can only view and sent messages, my test result, health concerns, and reminders. However, I cannot view past or schedule an appointments on the app. I have the iPhone 6 plus so I am not sure if that is the issue. I really would like to use that feature.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Improvements needed
text: Love this app , the only thing that makes it less than perfect is its inability to have notifications when we get email reply from dr or appointment reminders! Pls include these basic app abilities

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good idea but too many bugs
text: This could be great but it takes a very long time to send messages since it freezes every couple of seconds. Also, labs are not in order by date requiring searching. Also keeps asking for preferences so that doesn't appear to be remembered.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Amazing!
text:
The new application is insane! Time it takes to book an appointment went from 15 mins on the phone to 30 secs on the app. I am the happiest person today! :)

Thanks kaiser!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love the new layout but...
text: Love the new layout except when I went to double check what department I was supposed to go to for my appt, it doesn't show on there. Only gives the date, time and doctor. Please add it :)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: New upgrade crashing
text: With the new iOS upgrade, the app has been crashing when in the message section. The others work fine.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works great!
text: Overall it's a very useful app for staying in touch with your general physician or even specialist. Also it's great for making appointments or looking up your medical records.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A Good Start
text: I like the access to the services that KP Has on their website,  but some new features like wait times would be great.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it!
text: The ease of use is just fabulous!  Just refilled prescriptions by scanning the list and selecting the ones I needed.  Much faster than the refill phone system.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Don't refill your prescriptions with this app
text: Go online and do it, I requested a new inhaler yesterday, and when I checked the status today it said no request had been received. On top of that when I tried to go to the "refill screen" it kept sending me to the "check prescription status" screen. Don't try to refill prescriptions with this app.

name: Kaiser Permanente

Not sure why they needed to "fix" it... and of course this older version will no longer work because of the update. A HUGE step backwards here.

name: Kaiser Permanente

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Map feature not useful
text:
I have not tried to login yet but the map feature made me wonder if it is worth even trying. It took a couple of minutes for the app to become minimally responsive.

One major criticism of the map filter is that it does not list Kaiser's Urgent Care facilities. The Map Search does not pick up keywords so searching for 'urgent' sent me to Urgench, Uzbekistan! 

The filter allows one to choose Amenities or Other Services but does not give a second menu to further refine a search. 

Their website locator is not great but is better than this so no reason for this app to waste space on my phone.

name: myCigna
title: Garbage, just like DenyTillYouDieCigna
text:
This is just another layer in a policy of obstruction to make things as difficult as possible to get DenyTillYouDieCigna to pay for or do anything you pay dearly for them to allegedly do. The app is clunky and makes it near impossible to find anything medical service. You wonâ€™t be able to find a doctor much less a medical center or one of their many obstructionist locations. Just like DenyTillYouDieCigna, nothing works. Avoid this app and avoid anybody in bed with DenyTillYouDieCigna. You will end up paying for everything yourself, while still paying Cigna and having to fight for your life every grueling step of the way. This app does nothing to help and provides you no information that is helpful. DenyTillYouDieCigna is the poster child for *everything* that is wrong and broken in the American healthcare system. 

Avoid this app and any reason to try to use it and be greatly disappointed.

name: myCigna

They canâ€™t process my request at this time to try again later and to contact customer support. I have tried again at different time and still getting the error. I spoke with customer service and they told me there is a problem with the app and they are currently working on getting it resolved. But they donâ€™t have a estimated time when it will be resolved. I have been having an issue with the last couple of months already. When they app was working it was easy to you and I was able to keep track of all of my information. But now I have to login through the desktop to view my information. I hope they can get the issue resolve.

name: myCigna

name: myCigna

Canâ€™t begin to tell you how much I appreciate been able to access all the information about my husband recent prostate operation, received so many bills and felt lost, put all the paperwork together from Cigna, and FINALLY went to the APP and bingo everything was there EASY to find and all my questions were answered was able to take care of all our side of the billing.
GREAT JOB, love this app and THANK you so much for making our life so uncomplicated.

Great App
